NK040(thi)002:1: // bdud kyi gcod yul dgos 'dod kun 'byung rin po
NK040(thi)002:2: che mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK040(thi)002:3: pa lags so // na mo pra dz+ny+aa pa ra mi ta ye /
NK040(thi)002:4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)002:5: ye nas gnas lugs phyogs bral snying po'i don //
NK040(thi)002:6: bcing grol med las rkyen gyis 'khrul ma myong //
NK040(thi)002:7: dang po'i sangs rgyas yum chen pha rol phyin //
NK040(thi)002:8: mtha' rnams kun bral ma la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)002:9: mi yi khyu mchog 'gro ba'i mgon po rje //
NK040(thi)002:10: stong gsum 'jig rten kun la dbang bsgyur zhing //
NK040(thi)002:11: skal bzang 'di la mdzad pa mthar phyin pa'i //
NK040(thi)002:12: sh+aakya seng+ge'i zhabs la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)002:13: rtogs pa'i nyi zlas ma rig log rtogs bcom //
NK040(thi)002:14: thugs rje zer gyis mun pa sel mdzad rtags //
NK040(thi)002:15: shes rab ral gri klad la bskor chen mdzad //
NK040(thi)002:16: smra ba'i seng+ge'i zhabs la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)002:17: smra bsam las 'das shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK040(thi)002:18: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum //
NK040(thi)002:19: 'khor ba las sgrol tu re'i bdag nyid ma //
NK040(thi)002:20: rje btsun sgrol ma'i zhabs la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)002:21: bskal mang sngon nas sbyang pa zhib pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)002:22: rgya bod rtogs ldan grub thob mi gzugs can //
NK040(thi)002:23: bdag gzhan gnyis kyis don rnams smin mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)002:24: grub thob gcod brgyud rnams la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)002:25: lhan skyes ye shes ngang las ma g.yos kyang //
NK040(thi)002:26: sa steng 'di na gdul bya smin grol phyir //
NK040(thi)002:27: sprul pa'i sku mchog ma cig lab sgron zhes //
NK040(thi)002:28: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)002:29: gcod gzhung khrig chags khrigs med kha 'thor don //
NK040(thi)002:30: gzhan la phan sems ldan pas brjod min kyang //
NK040(thi)002:31: rang gis rang kha'i brjed pa spang ba'i phyir //
NK040(thi)002:32: phyogs tsam go nas zur tsam sdeb pa la //
NK040(thi)002:33: gcod brgyud rtogs ldan mkhas rnams mi bkyon zhu //
NK040(thi)002:34: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed par byed pa'i
NK040(thi)002:35: yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK040(thi)002:36: pa'i dgongs pa / dam chos bdud kyi gcod yul 'di /
NK040(thi)002:40: dngos grub rnam gnyis 'byung ba'i nor bu skam thag
NK040(thi)002:41: chu nang nas chod par byed pa'i thabs 'di la
NK040(thi)002:42: don lnga ste / zung bzhi ya brgyad kyis gcod kyi khog dbub pa /
NK040(thi)002:43: mtshon pa dpe drug gi gcod kyi che ba bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)002:44: phyi nang gsang gsum gyi sgo nas gcod kyi chos ngos bzung pa /
NK040(thi)002:45: blo ldog rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su sbyong ba /
NK040(thi)002:46: dngos grub rnam gnyis 'byung bar byed pa la gcod
NK040(thi)002:47: kyi man ngag lag len du bstan pa dngos so
NK040(thi)002:49: rigs kyi sgo nas phye na /
NK040(thi)002:50: bka' rgyud dang don rgyud gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:51: zhu ba po gang zag gi sgo nas phye na /
NK040(thi)002:52: pha rgyud dang ma rgyud gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:53: yongs su grags tshul gyi sgo nas phye na /
NK040(thi)002:54: bka' ma dang gter ma gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:55: ngo ba'i sgo nas dbye na /
NK040(thi)002:56: gzhung khrigs chags dang khrigs med kha 'thor gnyis so //
NK040(thi)002:57: dang po brgyud ngos bzung ba la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)002:58: phyi mtshan nyid ltar ngos bzung na /
NK040(thi)002:59: bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa la gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:64: des skyo ston bsod nams bla ma /
NK040(thi)002:67: des rim par brgyud pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:68: mtshan nyid ltar gyi bka' brgyud yin no //
NK040(thi)002:69: gnyis pa sngags ltar gyi bka' brgyud ngos bzung na /
NK040(thi)002:70: yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mas /
NK040(thi)002:71: drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen brgyud /
NK040(thi)002:76: gnyis pa don brgyud ltar ngos bzung na /
NK040(thi)002:77: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dngos las ma cig gis gsan pa yin te /
NK040(thi)002:78: mdo rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum kha 'don bgyis dang /
NK040(thi)002:79: gdam pa nang nas 'char gyin gsung /
NK040(thi)002:80: de bzhin mdzad nas gcod kyi gdam pa 'di ma cig gis thugs la 'khrungs pa'i myong chos yin /
NK040(thi)002:81: yang na don gyi brgyud pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:82: 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng+ge la gtad /
NK040(thi)002:83: smra ba'i seng+ge rang gi thugs ka nas ral gri bton nas sangs rgyas la gdeng pa la /
NK040(thi)002:85: ngas bdag med par bsad zin gyis /
NK040(thi)002:86: sems can rnams skye 'gags dang bral bar gsod cig
NK040(thi)002:87: gsungs nas don phar phyin gyi rjes su gnang bar
NK040(thi)002:88: mdzad do // gnyis pa pha brgyud dang ma rgyud ngos bzung ba la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)002:90: chos dbyings rang bzhin gyi rnam par dag pa'i ngang
NK040(thi)002:91: las sems can gyi don du rje btsun sgrol mas
NK040(thi)002:93: chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu de la 'ja' tshon
NK040(thi)002:94: lta bu'i sku gzugs zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma gser
NK040(thi)002:96: rat+na sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gcig byon nas /
NK040(thi)002:97: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don rje btsun sgrol mas gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:99: des dam pa rgya gar la gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:100: de nas rims par brgyud pa ni ma rgyud do //
NK040(thi)002:101: pha rgyud ni rab 'byor gyis zhus /
NK040(thi)002:102: ston pas gsung kun dga' bos bsdus nas byams mgon la gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:106: des dam pa rgya gar la sogs rim bzhin brgyud lugs ni bka' rgyud dang mthun no //
NK040(thi)002:107: gsum pa bka' gter gnyis ngos bzung ba ni gnyis
NK040(thi)002:108: kyi dang po ni ma cig rang gis gsung thams
NK040(thi)002:110: ci'i phyir na ma cig gis shes rab kyi pha
NK040(thi)002:111: rol tu phyin pa klog 'don byas pa'i dus su
NK040(thi)002:112: / bdud kyi le'u'i skabs su gzugs nas rnam pa
NK040(thi)002:113: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang la
NK040(thi)002:114: chags na yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o
NK040(thi)002:116: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //
NK040(thi)002:117: zhes pa sogs gzigs nas bdud bzhi rang sar grol
NK040(thi)002:118: ba'i rtog pa khyad par can bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK040(thi)002:119: gsung pa'i bka' dang khyad med du rtogs pas /
NK040(thi)002:120: ma cig gi gsung pa la bka' zhes brjod pa'i don de yin /
NK040(thi)002:121: yang na ni ma cig gis gsung pa'i gcod 'di lung ston pa'i bka' yang yin te /
NK040(thi)002:123: nga'i bstan pa'i snyigs ma la //
NK040(thi)002:124: yum chen pha rol phyin ma yis //
NK040(thi)002:125: sprul pa lab sgron zhes bya 'byung //
NK040(thi)002:126: phrin las chos kyi dbyings la spyod //
NK040(thi)002:127: de dang 'brel pa gang yod pa //
NK040(thi)002:128: bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK040(thi)002:131: lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la //
NK040(thi)002:132: rgyal ba'i yum gyi sprul pa ni //
NK040(thi)002:133: byang phyogs lab kyi grong khyer du //
NK040(thi)002:134: sgron me zhes bya'i ming can 'byung //
NK040(thi)002:135: skye med snying po'i don la mkhas //
NK040(thi)002:136: grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang //
NK040(thi)002:137: dur khrod bas mtha' khyab par nyal //
NK040(thi)002:141: sras mo bzhi la byin rlabs kyi bka' bab cing /
NK040(thi)002:142: sras mo bzhi'i chos thams cad la ma rgyud gter ma'i chos skor bya ba grags so //
NK040(thi)002:143: bzhi pa khrig chag khrig med ngos bzung la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)002:145: ma cig gis chos la dad nas bzung ste /
NK040(thi)002:146: sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gdul bya gcig drangs ba'i thabs kyis /
NK040(thi)002:147: chos thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'grig chags pa la khrig chags zer la /
NK040(thi)002:148: phyogs gcig tu ma 'grig cing man ngag gzer bu
NK040(thi)002:149: rnams 'thor nas yod pa la khrig med kha 'thor
NK040(thi)002:150: zer ro // yang na bka' brgyud don gyi chos thams cad la khrigs chags zer zhing /
NK040(thi)002:151: ma cig rang gi gang gsung thams cad la khrig med zer ba yang gada'o //
NK040(thi)002:153: phyi bka' tshom zhib rgyas su bshad pa /
NK040(thi)002:154: nang gdam ngag lag len du bstan pa /
NK040(thi)002:155: sgom pa zhal gdam gnad thebs su bstan pa /
NK040(thi)002:156: gsang ba brda' chos la bzla ru bstan pa'o //
NK040(thi)002:157: ma cig gis sras thams cad kyi gsungs pa rnams ni /
NK040(thi)002:158: khrig med kha 'thor yin par gsungs so //
NK040(thi)002:159: mdor na gcod thams cad kyis gdam pa gcig tu dril ba /
NK040(thi)002:160: gcod mkhan thams cad kyi nyams myong lhan gcig tu bsdus pa /
NK040(thi)002:161: bla ma thams cad kyi gsung sgros thabs gcig tu dril ba /
NK040(thi)002:162: a ma jo mo'i gcod skor ci snyed cig gsung yang /
NK040(thi)002:163: bka' brgyud dang don brgyud gnyis la ma 'dus pa med do //
NK040(thi)002:164: de yang +aar+ya de ba'i zhal snga nas /
NK040(thi)002:166: gdam ngag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub
NK040(thi)002:167: pa chen pos da lta'i bar du byin rlabs kyi
NK040(thi)002:168: brgyud pa ma chad pa yod pa'i phyir /
NK040(thi)002:169: bka' brgyud don gyi gdams pa zhes bya'o //
NK040(thi)002:170: de lta bu'i don la yid ches zhing khung btsun par bya ba'i phyir du /
NK040(thi)002:171: bka' brgyud dang don brgyud 'di'i lo rgyus ni /
NK040(thi)002:172: nye brgyud dang shin tu nye brgyud dang /
NK040(thi)002:176: rtsa ba'i bla ma yin te /
NK040(thi)002:178: bla ma rang chos sku nyid yin pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:179: mdo dang rgyud sde thams cad nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK040(thi)002:180: shin tu nye brgyud ni rang gi sems nyid yin no //
NK040(thi)002:182: 'da' ka ye shes kyi mdo las /
NK040(thi)002:183: sems rtogs sangs rgyas yin par nges //
NK040(thi)002:186: rdo rje phag mo ma gcig lab kyi sgron ma /
NK040(thi)002:194: kun dga' ye shes nas rim par brgyud do //
NK040(thi)002:200: des mkha' 'gro ma su ka si d+d+hi /
NK040(thi)002:202: de yang sku 'khrungs pa'i che ba'i yon tan ni /
NK040(thi)002:203: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi sku khrus mdzad pa'i khrus
NK040(thi)002:204: kyi rdzing bu'i nang na me tog pad+ma legs pa
NK040(thi)002:206: khye'u lo brgyad lon pa tsam gcig chos gos gsum dang bcas pa gcig sku 'khrungs pa yin no //
NK040(thi)002:207: de la 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis tshur shog gsung nas bsnyen rdzogs mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:208: de nas sde snod gsum dang brgyud sde bzhi'i chos
NK040(thi)002:209: ma lus pa bstan pas de rnams thugs su chud
NK040(thi)002:210: nas sa gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
NK040(thi)002:211: lha +aar+ya de wa zhes bya bar gyur to //
NK040(thi)002:212: de lta bu'i slob dpon des shes rab kyi pha
NK040(thi)002:213: rol tu phyin pa'i brjod bya don gyi snying po
NK040(thi)002:214: bsdus pa gzhung chen dang gzhung chung rnams mdzad pa
NK040(thi)002:215: yin no // slob dpon des dam pa rgya gar la gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:216: dam pa de'i lo rgyus ni khyad par drug dang ldan te /
NK040(thi)002:217: skyes pa rab kyi che ba /
NK040(thi)002:218: skye sa yul gyi che ba /
NK040(thi)002:219: bslab bya khrims kyi che ba /
NK040(thi)002:220: byin rlabs thugs rje'i che ba /
NK040(thi)002:221: sbyang pa yon tan gyi che ba /
NK040(thi)002:222: 'bras bu dngos grub gyi che ba'o //
NK040(thi)002:223: dang po ni skye ba bdun du skye ba gzhan
NK040(thi)002:224: gyi bar ma chod pa mi lus gtsang ma nyi
NK040(thi)002:225: rtse thob par / pan+di ta 'ba' zhig tu gyur /
NK040(thi)002:226: skye ba 'dir rigs bzhi las khyad par 'phags pa bram zer skyes so //
NK040(thi)002:227: skye sa yul gyi che ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:228: lho phyogs b+he te'i yul tsha ri si nga bya
NK040(thi)002:229: ba thugs rje chen pos byin gyis rlabs pa'i yul
NK040(thi)002:231: yab bram ze brtson 'grus go cha /
NK040(thi)002:232: yum bram ze mo sa ral ta bya ba la sras gsum yod pa'i bar ma yin no //
NK040(thi)002:233: slab bya khrims kyi che ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:234: lo bcu gsum nas dpal 'bri ka ma sh+ri la'i
NK040(thi)002:235: gtsug lag khang du rab tu byung nas dge tshul
NK040(thi)002:236: mdzad / bla ma gser gling pa la byang chub
NK040(thi)002:237: mchog tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom
NK040(thi)002:238: mdzad / pa zhus / rnal 'byor pho mo lnga bcu rtsa bzhi la dbang zhus te /
NK040(thi)002:239: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig bsrung /
NK040(thi)002:240: byin rlabs thugs rje'i che ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:241: rnal 'byor pho mo lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i rjes su bzung ste /
NK040(thi)002:242: dbang gdams pa dang bcas pa rdzogs par gnang /
NK040(thi)002:243: byin gyis brlabs pas mthu dang nus pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK040(thi)002:244: sbyangs pa yon tan gyi che ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:245: lo lnga nas 'bri klog bslab nas legs par mkhyen /
NK040(thi)002:246: phyi mtshan nyid kyi sde snod /
NK040(thi)002:247: nang gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde ma lus pa mkhyen
NK040(thi)002:248: cing rigs pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa'i pan+di ta
NK040(thi)002:250: 'bras bu dngos grub kyi che ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:251: thun mongs gi dngos grub grub chen brgyad thob /
NK040(thi)002:252: sa 'og ral gri mig sman dang /
NK040(thi)002:253: rkang mgyogs ril bu mi snang ba /
NK040(thi)002:254: bcud kyis len dang mkha' la 'gro /
NK040(thi)002:255: mchog gis dngos grub phyag rgya chen po mchog gis rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa lags so //
NK040(thi)002:256: de lta bu'i bla ma des bod du 'gro ba'i
NK040(thi)002:257: dus la babs par dgongs nas byon pa las dus
NK040(thi)002:258: lan gcig na / dpon g.yog gsum rgya gar tha
NK040(thi)002:259: 'khob gcig tu tshur la byon tsa na dge bshes
NK040(thi)002:260: dngos grub snying po bya ba gra'i mda' thang pa
NK040(thi)002:261: lan gcig na / gcig yin pas / rgya gar
NK040(thi)002:262: du byon nas lo tsa ba'i chos drug la bslab
NK040(thi)002:263: pa yin zer nas chu shing gi phur pa la
NK040(thi)002:264: sems can gyi gzugs sna tshogs bkod pa mthong ba
NK040(thi)002:265: lan gcig na / gcig yin pas / dang /
NK040(thi)002:266: bla ma sma ra ser po can bya ba bod
NK040(thi)002:267: kyi chos la yid ma ches pas rgya gar du
NK040(thi)002:268: gdam pa tshol du byon pas ma rnyed pa tshur
NK040(thi)002:269: log nas bal yul du bla ma ha ngu la
NK040(thi)002:270: phag mo zhu ru 'gro zer ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:271: tshong pa mang po dang 'grogs byung ste /
NK040(thi)002:272: bal yul du sleb pa dang der zla ba gcig
NK040(thi)002:273: 'gor te bod du 'ong ba'i lam du zhugs pa'i
NK040(thi)002:274: dus su rje dam pa rgya gar dang 'grog nas
NK040(thi)002:275: 'ongs so // der khong gnyis kyi sems la rje
NK040(thi)002:276: dam pa rgya gar ni ngo ma shes bla ma
NK040(thi)002:277: a tsa ra 'di grub thob gcig yin nges par
NK040(thi)002:278: 'ongs so // 'dug ste / nang pa sangs rgyas
NK040(thi)002:279: pa dang phyi pa mu stegs pa gang yin ngo
NK040(thi)002:280: ma shes pas gdams ngag yang ma zhus so //
NK040(thi)002:281: de nas mang yul du slebs pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:282: a tsa ra'i tshang pa gdal cig 'dug pas de
NK040(thi)002:283: kun a tsa ra la mos gus drag po byed
NK040(thi)002:285: bla ma 'di ji skad bya ba yin dris pas /
NK040(thi)002:286: rgya gar pan+di ta ka ma shi la bya yin /
NK040(thi)002:287: bod na dam pa rgya gar bya ba grags zer ro //
NK040(thi)002:288: pan+di ta mkhas pa gru thob chen po gcig yin /
NK040(thi)002:289: sngar yang bod du lan mang du byon pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:290: da res kyang bod du bzhud par 'dug zer ro //
NK040(thi)002:291: der dge bshes kyi gdam ngag gcig zhu byas pas khyod kyis mkhar ba 'di thong dang gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:292: btang bas 'di 'dra sems bskyed 'chor ba'i rgyu yin /
NK040(thi)002:293: mu stegs kyi rdzu 'phrul byed pa la dgos pa'i lag cha yin /
NK040(thi)002:294: ngas kyang shes te ma byas pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:295: sems can bslu na 'di dgos pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:296: chog la thongs gsungs nas bcag go //
NK040(thi)002:297: gdams pa zhus pas khyod rang phyi yi snang ba nang du ma len /
NK040(thi)002:298: nang gi snang ba phyir ma spro /
NK040(thi)002:299: sems lus la ma chags lus sems khrol la rang sor zhog gsungs pas /
NK040(thi)002:300: de la nges shes bskyed nas rtsa ba'i bla mar bzung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:301: bla ma sma ra ser po'i bsam pa la /
NK040(thi)002:302: chos kyi mi tshol du ma byung na /
NK040(thi)002:303: mis chos btsal bas rnyed par mi 'dug /
NK040(thi)002:304: rgya gar du chos btsal bas ma rnyed pas bod du log pas /
NK040(thi)002:305: bla ma grub thob gcig dang mjal 'dug snyam pa byung /
NK040(thi)002:306: bla ma la gdam pa gcig zhu byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:307: khyed la gdams pa ster sa gcig da gzod 'ong bar gad'i gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:308: de nas dge bshes dang tshong pa rnams la stod lho la song /
NK040(thi)002:309: a tsa ra dpon g.yog tsho la stod byang la bzhugs par 'dug nas /
NK040(thi)002:310: bla ma sma ra ser po'i bsam pa la /
NK040(thi)002:311: bla ma 'di gang du bzhugs pa'i phyag phyir 'brang la /
NK040(thi)002:312: gdams ngag gcig thob par bya dgongs na 'grogs nas byon no //
NK040(thi)002:313: de nas 'dog stag ris bya bar byon /
NK040(thi)002:314: mgron khang gcig tu sleb pa dang bzhugs pas byin rlabs zhu ba mang po byung ste /
NK040(thi)002:315: mig long ba phyed pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:316: rna ba 'on pa phyed pa la sogs pa mang po byung bas thams cad ngo mtshar skyes so //
NK040(thi)002:317: yul der dge bshes skyo sh+aakya ye shes bya ba mdo sgyu 'phrul la mkhas pa gcig gdan drangs /
NK040(thi)002:318: tshogs kyi 'khor lo mdzad cing bzhugs pa la /
NK040(thi)002:319: khong gi phyag phyi nas myang ston grags chen grags chung bya ba /
NK040(thi)002:320: pha mes kun sngags pa mthu chen dang 'gras nas mdzes khyer ba'i byis pa gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:321: pha mdze pho gcig gis 'bum bcu drug dum pa gcig dang bcas gdan drangs nas phul te /
NK040(thi)002:322: gnyer gtan nas yod pa dge bshes sku bsod che
NK040(thi)002:323: bas byis pa gnyis nya ra ma byung par smin
NK040(thi)002:324: ma byi / gdon gyis gnod pa'i rtags tsho shar bas /
NK040(thi)002:325: dge bshes thugs khral du song zhing yod pa la /
NK040(thi)002:326: mgron khang na a tsa ra byin rlabs can gcig 'dug zer ba thos nas /
NK040(thi)002:328: spyir khyed rgya gar ba rigs pa'i 'byung gnas yin pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:329: khyad par du bla ma khyed ngo mtshar can gcig
NK040(thi)002:330: mchis na bdag la byis pa lha 'dre'i za 'phro
NK040(thi)002:331: gnyis yod pas / de gnyis la byin rlabs gcig thugs la gdag par zhu dang byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:332: de tsug bya'i gsungs nas de'i dus sma ra ser po can la /
NK040(thi)002:333: da ni khyod kyis 'dod pa'i gdams ngag gcig 'ong bar gda' gsungs nas /
NK040(thi)002:334: der bsnyen bkur byas shing gdams pa zhus pas /
NK040(thi)002:335: byis pa gnyis sma ra ser po can dge bshes skyo dang bzhi la gdam pa btab ste /
NK040(thi)002:336: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhung brul tsho drug gnang ste /
NK040(thi)002:337: de nyid du yi ge ris su btab nas ngo sprod zhal gdams dang bcas pa zhus te /
NK040(thi)002:338: byis pa gnyis pos nyams su blangs pas nad sos te grub thob bzang pa re byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:339: bka' gdam pa chig brgyud las ma spel lo //
NK040(thi)002:340: de la yi ge gcig ma'i gdam pa 'di yin zer nas bag re 'phel ba 'di yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:341: slob dpon des skyo ston la gsungs te /
NK040(thi)002:342: skyo ston de'i lo rgyus ni /
NK040(thi)002:343: zur po che shag 'byung gi dbon po skyo byung bsod nams bla ma skal ldan du gzigs nas /
NK040(thi)002:344: dam pas bsod nams bla ma khyed gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde la mkhas pa /
NK040(thi)002:345: rtogs pa phul tu phyin pa slob ma dpag tu med pa bsdus pa yin kyang /
NK040(thi)002:346: don khong du ma chud pas 'khor ba las rta rnga 'gros gang yang ma 'phags pas /
NK040(thi)002:347: long bas long ba khrid nas 'dug gsungs pas /
NK040(thi)002:348: 'o na bdag la don gyi phar phyin gnang bar
NK040(thi)002:349: zhu gsungs nas rta dang gser g.yu la sogs pa'i
NK040(thi)002:350: longs spyod chen po phul nas /
NK040(thi)002:351: sems bskyed nam mkha' go 'byed dang gdam ngag ma lus pa gnang nas /
NK040(thi)002:352: gnyan khrod 'grim pas gnyis su med pa'i don khong
NK040(thi)002:353: du chud grwa pa mang pos bskor ba'i mkhas pa
NK040(thi)002:354: chen po yin kyang snang ba bden 'dzin thams cad
NK040(thi)002:355: dang bral de chos brgyad zhig nas /
NK040(thi)002:356: la ber chen po gcig gsol nas rgyal khams phyogs med du byon nas /
NK040(thi)002:357: ma cig lab kyi sgron ma la don gyi gdam pa 'di gsungs so //
NK040(thi)002:358: ma cig de'i lo rgyus ni /
NK040(thi)002:359: yum gyi thugs rgyud gling bzhi'i sku yi bkod pa /
NK040(thi)002:360: yum gyi thugs sprul grangs med byung /
NK040(thi)002:361: gling bzhi las sum cu rtsa gsum dga' ldan lha yi yul dang gcig /
NK040(thi)002:362: 'gro don rdo rje gdan gyi yul dang gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:363: 'dzam gling bod kyi yul dang gsum /
NK040(thi)002:364: nub phyogs u rgyan gyi yul dang bzhi /
NK040(thi)002:365: gling bzhi la 'gro don mdzad lugs ni /
NK040(thi)002:366: yum gyi thugs sprul dpa' bo'i tshogs dang /
NK040(thi)002:367: dpa' mo'i tshogs dang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i sprul sku dpag med 'byung /
NK040(thi)002:368: sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas 'og ma na /
NK040(thi)002:369: yum gyi thugs sprul rigs ldan mang du 'byung /
NK040(thi)002:370: lha rnams longs spyod tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing 'gro ba thabs kyis 'dul /
NK040(thi)002:371: sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas la /
NK040(thi)002:372: gling chen po gdal skyob bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:373: gling de la bskor bzhi yod de /
NK040(thi)002:374: dbus kyi gling ni mtsho ha la gdal skyob kyi gling /
NK040(thi)002:375: lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
NK040(thi)002:376: rol mo dang mchod pa 'bul ba'i sa der lha'i rgyal po gcig bzhugs ste /
NK040(thi)002:377: yum gyi sku'i sprul pas lha rnams bde ba la bkod pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:378: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas bzhugs te /
NK040(thi)002:379: lha longs spyod la yeng bar snang /
NK040(thi)002:380: gling chen po gdal skyob bya ba'i shar phyogs na
NK040(thi)002:381: bkra shis sgo mang bya ba'i gling gcig yod de
NK040(thi)002:382: / de'i grong khyer na yum gyi gsung gi sprul pas 'dul ba'i zhing yod /
NK040(thi)002:383: gdal skyob kyi lho phyogs na /
NK040(thi)002:384: nor bu phun tshogs kyi gling bya ba yod /
NK040(thi)002:385: yum gyi thugs kyis sprul pas 'dul ba'i zhing yod /
NK040(thi)002:386: gdal skyob kyi nub phyogs kyi gling ni /
NK040(thi)002:387: skyo ngal med pa bdal ba'i gling bya ba yod /
NK040(thi)002:388: yum gyis yon tan gyi 'dul ba'i gling yod /
NK040(thi)002:389: gdal skyob kyi byang phyogs kyi gling ni /
NK040(thi)002:390: kun d+ha li d+ha na'i gling bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:391: yum gyis phrin las kyi 'dul ba'i zhing yod /
NK040(thi)002:392: gling chen po gdal skyob bya ba la /
NK040(thi)002:393: gling chen po bzhis bskor ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:394: gling re re la yang 'dzam bu gling tsam brgya brgya yod /
NK040(thi)002:395: de la sgra snyan gyi gling /
NK040(thi)002:398: kun d+ha ra phun tshogs kyi gling /
NK040(thi)002:400: de yan chad na lha'i gling dang grong khyer bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyi mi long ba yod /
NK040(thi)002:401: lha rnams kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi longs spyod dang rgyan la yeng ba mang ngo //
NK040(thi)002:402: lha 'ga' zhig gi rgya gar gyi yul du 'gro don byed pa yang mang ngo //
NK040(thi)002:403: lha 'ga' zhig bod yum du ltung bas phog pa yang mang ngo //
NK040(thi)002:404: lha 'ga' zhig bar dor 'khyams pa yang mang ngo //
NK040(thi)002:405: lha 'ga' zhig phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyi brgyud pa zam ma chad pa yang mang ngo //
NK040(thi)002:406: gdal skyob kyi shar phyogs kyi gling bkra shis sgo mang gi dbus su /
NK040(thi)002:407: phun tshogs dpal ri'i gling bya ba gcig yod /
NK040(thi)002:408: gling chen po de'i rgyud la skyes pa yin te /
NK040(thi)002:409: gling chen po de'i dbus su lhun grub kyi mchod rten gcig bzhugs te /
NK040(thi)002:410: de la rang byung gi mchod rten stong rtsa gnyis byon /
NK040(thi)002:411: lha'i bu dang bu mos mchod pa'i longs spyod kyi gter 'bul /
NK040(thi)002:412: gling de ni yum gyi gsung gis 'dul ba'i gling yin /
NK040(thi)002:413: yum gyi gsung gi rnam sprul dpa' mo'i tshogs /
NK040(thi)002:414: d+aa ki ma gcig la 'khor yang d+aa ki ma dpag med kyis bskor ba bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:415: gling chen po gdal skyob kyi lho phyogs kyi gling na /
NK040(thi)002:416: nor bu phun tshogs kyi gling de la rang byung gi lo pan shel gyi mchod rten gcig yod /
NK040(thi)002:417: phyogs bzhi na me tog gi gling chen po bzhi yod /
NK040(thi)002:418: me tog gi gling de la lha'i bu dang bu mo'i mchod pa 'bul lo //
NK040(thi)002:419: de na yum gyi thugs sprul dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i
NK040(thi)002:420: tshogs mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog ser mo gcig gis
NK040(thi)002:422: nyi ma thang gcig tsa lha'i bu dang bu mo
NK040(thi)002:423: rnams kyis mchod pa rol mo mang po byas nas
NK040(thi)002:424: 'og min gyis dbus su yum gyi drung du sleb
NK040(thi)002:425: de byon / yum gyis zhal nas /
NK040(thi)002:426: nor bu phun tshogs kyis gling du 'gro don la mi bzhugs nas /
NK040(thi)002:429: lha longs spyod la yeng bar snang /
NK040(thi)002:430: ngas kyang lo khri tsho gcig 'dul yum gyi thugs kyi sprul pa grangs med gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:431: da ni nub phyogs u rgyan gyi yul du 'gro
NK040(thi)002:432: dgos gsung nas 'ja' dang 'od kyi tshul du yal
NK040(thi)002:433: skad / de nas yum gyi thugs sprul 'gro ba
NK040(thi)002:434: 'dul ba'i d+aak+ki ma de nor bu phun tshogs kyi
NK040(thi)002:435: gling du byon nas lha'i sku ru sprul te /
NK040(thi)002:436: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzhan snang med rig pa dri
NK040(thi)002:437: med yum la zhugs te yab ni lha bde skyob
NK040(thi)002:438: bya ba yin / yum ni bal mo mtsho bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:439: de gnyis lhums su zhugs pa'i d+aak+ki ma de nor
NK040(thi)002:440: bu phun tshogs kyi gling du byon nas mkha' 'gro
NK040(thi)002:441: ma de lha'i lo gsum red tsa nor bu phun
NK040(thi)002:442: tshogs kyi gling du 'gro don byed cing bzhugs so
NK040(thi)002:443: // khong gi lus ni lha'i lus yin /
NK040(thi)002:444: sems ni yum gyi thugs yin /
NK040(thi)002:445: lha rnams thabs kyis 'dul zhing ma rgyud kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing yod /
NK040(thi)002:446: lo pan shel gyi mchod rten la lha rnams kyi
NK040(thi)002:447: mchod pa 'bul zhing smon lam 'debs pa yang mang
NK040(thi)002:450: nor bu phun tshogs kyi gling des mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:451: bskor ba byed pa yang mang 'dug /
NK040(thi)002:452: yum gyi thugs sprul mkha' 'gro ma des /
NK040(thi)002:453: yum gyi thugs bcud chos rnams dang /
NK040(thi)002:454: snga ma'i chos kyi gling sde dang /
NK040(thi)002:455: gsang sngags u dum wa ra'i rgyud dang /
NK040(thi)002:456: thugs bcud ma rig mun sel gyi rgyud dang rgyud tshan lnga 'chad cing bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:457: nub mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs mchod de /
NK040(thi)002:458: u rgyan gyi gnas su yang tshogs kyi longs spyod dang /
NK040(thi)002:459: gtor chen yang mchod nas lha'i lo khri tsho phyed gnyis bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:460: dus kyi tha ma nyin gcig tsa mkha' 'gro ma
NK040(thi)002:461: sku mdog sngo sang nge ba gcig mdun du byon
NK040(thi)002:462: nas / lha'i yul du 'gro don ma rdzogs sam /
NK040(thi)002:463: logs su 'gro don byed rgyu med dam zer /
NK040(thi)002:464: spros pa nyer bar zhi bar bgyis gcig zer skad /
NK040(thi)002:466: phun tshogs kyi gling 'di lta bu'i yul la yod /
NK040(thi)002:467: pha ma ni lha'i dbang po sde tshogs yod /
NK040(thi)002:468: chos la ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang spyod kyi chos 'di lta bu 'gro ba 'dren pa la /
NK040(thi)002:469: logs su ci 'dra ba 'dren dgos ang bsam pa byung /
NK040(thi)002:470: mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma de med skad /
NK040(thi)002:471: de'i phyir nyin rgya gar rdo rje gdan du chos
NK040(thi)002:472: kyi mchod pa byed pa'i rdo rje gdan gyi dung
NK040(thi)002:476: lha cha'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa grags nas /
NK040(thi)002:477: der lha gnas kyi lha rnams ltad mo la byon te /
NK040(thi)002:478: phun tshogs rin chen gyi gling nas kyang /
NK040(thi)002:479: yum gyi thugs sprul de yang 'khor ni lha'i bu
NK040(thi)002:480: dang bu mo lnga brgya dang 'grogs nas rdo rje
NK040(thi)002:481: gdan du ltad mo dang sh+aakya thub pa mchod pa
NK040(thi)002:482: la byon te / rgya gar gyi grong khyer chen po ser skya bya ba na /
NK040(thi)002:483: rgya gar gyi shag rig a'i dbang phyug bya ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:484: yum lha za klu sgron gnyis kyis mchod pa byed pa'i tshogs mang po bsham /
NK040(thi)002:485: ser skya'i grong chen po'i dbus su yum chen mo man chad /
NK040(thi)002:486: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab cing /
NK040(thi)002:487: nged bza' mi 'di gnyis bram ze'i rigs rgya gar shag rigs kyi brgyud pa 'di la /
NK040(thi)002:488: rgyud pa chad la khad pas de'i mya ngan gyi gdung zhing yod pas /
NK040(thi)002:489: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang /
NK040(thi)002:490: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gnas man chad kyi lha rnams dang /
NK040(thi)002:491: nged rgya gar rdo rje gdan gyi shag rigs a'i dbang phyug 'di /
NK040(thi)002:492: sngon nas smon lam mthun pa yin pas smon lam
NK040(thi)002:493: btab dgos zer nas smon lam rgya chen po btab
NK040(thi)002:494: / phun tshogs kyi gling nas byon pa'i mkha' 'gro ma de yum gyi thugs sprul yin gyis /
NK040(thi)002:495: sum cu rtsa sum dga' ldan lha gnas su 'gro don rdzogs pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:496: ser skya'i bza' mi gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:498: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis rkyen gyis mkha' 'gro ma des ltung bas phog nas /
NK040(thi)002:499: bram ze'i bza' mi gnyis kyi smon lam 'grub de'i lhums su zhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:500: de yan chad dga' ldan lha yul sum cu rtsa
NK040(thi)002:501: gsum lha gnas su skyes pa'i le'u ste dang po'o
NK040(thi)002:502: //// de nas rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs na ser skya bya ba'i gling gcig yod de /
NK040(thi)002:503: gling de'i grong khyer la 'bum tsho gsum yod skad /
NK040(thi)002:504: grong stod na chu mig 'bab pa de grong dkyil na rta rab kyi mi chod pa /
NK040(thi)002:505: grong smad na gru rdzing dgos skad /
NK040(thi)002:506: grong khyer de la rgya gar shag rigs kyi rgyal brgyud gsum yod /
NK040(thi)002:507: rgya gar gyi grong khyer de'i dbus su pho brang chen po shing rta gzing bya ba gcig yod /
NK040(thi)002:508: de rgya gar shag rigs a'i dbang phyug bya ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:509: lha za klu sgron bya ba gnyis su sku 'khrungs pa'i sras gcig yod de /
NK040(thi)002:510: de ni o rgyan gyi rin chen phun tshos kyi
NK040(thi)002:511: gling yum chen mo thugs sprul mkha' 'gro ma de
NK040(thi)002:512: ltung bas phog pa'i dus na bram ze bza' mi
NK040(thi)002:513: gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:514: rgya gar sh+aaka rigs su sku 'khrungs skad /
NK040(thi)002:515: rgya gar gyi a tsa ra pan+di ta gcig gis ming btag pas /
NK040(thi)002:516: yab rgya gar gyis a'i dbang phyug /
NK040(thi)002:517: yum lha za klu sgron ma gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa'i bu yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:519: khong yab yum gnyis skyid pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:521: dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas la smon lam btab cing mchod pa phul ba'i yon tan yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:522: da yang mchod pa 'bul zhing smon lam btab zer zhing /
NK040(thi)002:523: mchod pa rgya chen po shugs ldan gyi sprin tsam bsham /
NK040(thi)002:524: rgyal rgyud ya ta ma tha gnyis bos /
NK040(thi)002:526: sras 'khrungs pa'i phye mar byas thams cad kyis smon lam grub pa lags so zer skad /
NK040(thi)002:527: khong rang la yang skor nor glang chen stong dang /
NK040(thi)002:528: ma he yod pa brgya brgya min pa kun bkyes /
NK040(thi)002:529: de nas lo bcu lo na tsa ma bslab pas yi ge shes /
NK040(thi)002:530: ma bsgrub pa'i bsgom dang rtog pa 'char /
NK040(thi)002:531: slob dpon b+ha ra sid+d+hi bya ba'i drung du song /
NK040(thi)002:534: pan+di ta des khyod pha'i ming ci yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:535: nga'i pha'i ming ni shaka rigs a'i dbang phyug bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:536: yum ni lha za klu sgron bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:537: de gnyis kyis smon lam grub pa yin skad /
NK040(thi)002:538: nga rang la yang smon lam grub du brtag pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:539: de nas slob dpon gyis de yang las dang smon lam la /
NK040(thi)002:541: da yang 'dul ba'i khrims bsrung na des chog gsung /
NK040(thi)002:542: de nas lo bcu gsum la bla ma'i drung du bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:543: sgra tshad ma dang pha rol tu phyin pa rgyud la shar /
NK040(thi)002:544: de nas phyi rol du byon nas rgya gar rdo rje gdan du kha bltas nas song /
NK040(thi)002:545: phyi pa mu stegs pa'i gling dang /
NK040(thi)002:546: du ru ka'i gling chung rnams kyis nang nas sangs
NK040(thi)002:547: rgyas pa la chos byed pa rdzun yin zer nas
NK040(thi)002:549: khong la mu stegs kyi chas ni med /
NK040(thi)002:550: sngar ni mu stegs pa dang brtsod gling ci 'dra yod ni cha med /
NK040(thi)002:551: de nas nang pa'i sde a tsa ra gcig der snang ba dang 'phrad /
NK040(thi)002:554: da khyod mu stegs kyi sde la the mdog gyis /
NK040(thi)002:555: de min khyod bsad pa yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:556: de nas mu stegs kyis brtsod pa byed du byung pa la /
NK040(thi)002:557: da yang khyed kyi sde la 'ong byas pa las
NK040(thi)002:558: khong rnams dga' nas sang nang par sdom pa 'bog
NK040(thi)002:559: gis zer / de nub zhabs tog gzab /
NK040(thi)002:560: mu stegs rnams kho rang chos spyod tshar nas /
NK040(thi)002:561: mtshan la rdo rje gdan la 'gro dgos bsam tsa /
NK040(thi)002:562: sgo rnams 'dan pas 'gro sa ma rnyed /
NK040(thi)002:563: sgo bsrung rnams la yu'u sgo'i phyi rol na /
NK040(thi)002:564: ka ka li la phyag dang bskor ba byed du 'gro byas tsa /
NK040(thi)002:565: sgo bsrungs des dad pa che ba yin no snyams nas sgo phyes /
NK040(thi)002:566: kho rang yang phyi rol du ka ka li la phyag dang bskor ba byed cing bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:567: de nas rdo rje gdan du kha bltas nas 'ong pa la /
NK040(thi)002:568: nyi ma dros tsa na rdo rje gdan du phyin nas /
NK040(thi)002:570: ser skya chen po'i grong khyer du skyes pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:571: nga'i pha la a'i dbang phyug bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:572: ma ni lha za klu sgron bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:573: slob dpon ni d+harma sid+d+hi bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:574: rdo rje gdan du rtsod pa la yong ba yin
NK040(thi)002:575: byas tsa der nang pa dang rtsod pa byas tsa
NK040(thi)002:576: / khong la brten pa gcig kyang ma byung /
NK040(thi)002:577: phyi pa mu stegs pa'i chas byas nas rtsod tsa khong rgyal du song /
NK040(thi)002:578: de nas mu stegs kyi gling du rkang mgyogs pa btang nas /
NK040(thi)002:579: mu stegs kyi sde tshan rtsod pa la yar shog byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:580: zhag gsum dus thog la sleb nas phyin /
NK040(thi)002:581: nang pa'i gral g.yas su byas /
NK040(thi)002:582: mu stegs kyi gral g.yon du byas /
NK040(thi)002:583: nang pa'i sde tshan 'bum tsho bcu gsum 'dus /
NK040(thi)002:584: phyi pa la 'bum tsho bco brgyad 'dus /
NK040(thi)002:585: zla ba gcig dang zhag bdun gyis bar du rtsod pa byas /
NK040(thi)002:586: mu stegs kyi sde tshan 'bum tsho bcu bdun de nang pa la btsud /
NK040(thi)002:587: 'bum tsho gcig de kho rang gi yul la slar ldog /
NK040(thi)002:588: der yang 'gro don rgya chen por 'phel lo //
NK040(thi)002:589: de nas ser skya'i yul du byon /
NK040(thi)002:590: yab grong pa dang dus gcig la ser skya'i pan+di ta 'bum tsho gsum bsdus nas /
NK040(thi)002:591: der yang 'gro don rgya chen po 'phel lo //
NK040(thi)002:592: yab kyi dge ba grangs med pa byas /
NK040(thi)002:593: dge rtsa de tshar nas yum yang grong de la yang dge rtsa grangs med byas /
NK040(thi)002:596: mi bzho ba stong dang sum stong /
NK040(thi)002:597: rgyal po'i skor cha thams cad bla ma dang pan+di ta'i phyogs su btang /
NK040(thi)002:598: kun la 'gyed dang mchod pa byas /
NK040(thi)002:599: skor mdzod bran g.yog dang bcas pa phas spun la gtad /
NK040(thi)002:600: nam gyi tho rang la gcig pur zang gling gyi grong khyer du byon /
NK040(thi)002:601: zangs gling du gu ru rat+na bya ba'i drung du rgyud la shar ba'i rtogs pa phul /
NK040(thi)002:602: lo gsum bsdad nas nyams len ga dar mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:603: de nas rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs su purna nye ba'i dur khrod gcig yod /
NK040(thi)002:604: dur khrod kyi gling der nyal nas sdad tsa /
NK040(thi)002:605: dur khrod kyi mkha' 'gro ma gcig rus pa'i rgyan cha drug thog nas /
NK040(thi)002:606: rgya gar gyi a tsa ra khyod nga'i dur khrod
NK040(thi)002:607: kyi gling min pa nyal sa ma rnyed pa e
NK040(thi)002:608: yin zer nas / 'jigs pa'i skad du ma ston /
NK040(thi)002:609: de nas khong gis gsol ba btab cing bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:611: a tsa ra khyod dur khrod du nyal ba'i chos mi shes pa gcig zer /
NK040(thi)002:612: de nas rdo rje gdan gyi byang phyogs su /
NK040(thi)002:613: po ta la'i ri la byon te brag phug pa tra bya ba snang /
NK040(thi)002:614: der rgya gar gyi pan+di ta gcig bsgom zhing bzhugs zin /
NK040(thi)002:615: de'i drung du phyin nas sems la phan pa'i chos cig zhu byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:616: a tsa ra de'i zhal nas /
NK040(thi)002:617: lar lta rtogs sems la gyis dang /
NK040(thi)002:619: bod kyi yul du 'gro don byed dgos pas /
NK040(thi)002:620: dge sbyor myur du skyong gcig gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:621: a tsa ra de skad gsung nas mi snang skad /
NK040(thi)002:622: de nas khong gis sems bun long gis song nas /
NK040(thi)002:623: thugs la mi bde ba mang du byung /
NK040(thi)002:624: dbu gtum nas mal du gzim tsa /
NK040(thi)002:625: nam gyi tho rang khar brag gi glo nas bud
NK040(thi)002:626: med gcig gis skad lhang gis 'bod pa gcig byung
NK040(thi)002:627: tsa / a tsa ra khyed mya ngan gyi mtsho la /
NK040(thi)002:628: byang chub kyis sems rkyal du ma bcug la yar long dang /
NK040(thi)002:629: khyed kyis sems de bod rigs ngan gyi yul du 'gro dgos zer ba snyam byung ste /
NK040(thi)002:630: bod yul du 'gro don mdzad nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob skad /
NK040(thi)002:631: khong gis thugs la de bas kyang sems 'khrugs te gzim nas /
NK040(thi)002:632: nam langs tsa na bud med dmar mo gcig gis nga bod yul nas 'ong ba yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:633: rigs ldan skyes bu a tsa ra /
NK040(thi)002:634: khyed dang po sku 'khrungs pa sum cu rtsa gsum dga' ldan lha'i gnas su sku 'khrungs /
NK040(thi)002:635: de nas rgya gar ser skya tu sku 'khrungs /
NK040(thi)002:637: da bod yul du 'gro don mdzad nas su /
NK040(thi)002:638: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yin gsungs so //
NK040(thi)002:639: rgya gar gyi chos thams cad bod yul du dar ba yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:640: mkha' 'gro lnga'i sgrub pa gyis shig gsungs nas /
NK040(thi)002:642: de nas mal du bzhugs nas /
NK040(thi)002:643: mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i bsgrub pa mdzad tsa zhag gsum nas 'tsho ba 'dren pa byung /
NK040(thi)002:644: zla ba gsum na mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ste /
NK040(thi)002:645: mkha' 'gro ma lngas a tsa ra smon lam 'grub gyi thugs bsgyur te /
NK040(thi)002:646: da ni bod yul du 'gro don la ya nga spangs dgos pa gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:647: khong gis thugs bsgyur nas 'gro don ran kyang rgya
NK040(thi)002:648: gar gyi yul du chags pa'i sems dang ma bral
NK040(thi)002:649: nas / rgya gar gyis yul na mkha' 'gro ma lnga bsgrub ste khong gis thugs bsgyur thub ste /
NK040(thi)002:650: de nas nyin gcig tsa mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar mo gcig gis /
NK040(thi)002:651: a tsa ra smon lam grub khyed rigs pa dri med ngang la bstim gcig gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:652: khong gis rgyab tu sil zer ba'i snang ba cig byung ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:653: phyi mig gcig bltas tsa mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog
NK040(thi)002:654: mthing nag gcig sku la rus pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan
NK040(thi)002:656: g.yon na thod khrag bsnams pa /
NK040(thi)002:657: kha tam kha gru mo tu bcug pa gcig snang bas /
NK040(thi)002:658: a tsa ra smon lam grub khyod bod yul du 'gro don la shog cig zer nas /
NK040(thi)002:659: gri gug ske la rgyab ste mgo lus phyes /
NK040(thi)002:660: bem rig phral nas mkha' 'gro ma la rigs pa zhugs te bod yul du 'ong ngo //
NK040(thi)002:661: de nas bod kyi dbus ngam shod kyi yul smad
NK040(thi)002:662: grong tsho mer re bya ba yab kher gad chos
NK040(thi)002:664: yum phyug mo 'bum lcam gnyis kyi lhums su zhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:665: de yan chad rgya gar rdo rje gdan dang ser skya'i grong khyer chen po dang /
NK040(thi)002:666: mu stegs pa rnams nang pa'i sde la bkod pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:667: bod yul du 'gro don la byon pa'i lung ston dang gleng gzhi'i le'u las /
NK040(thi)002:668: gling gnyis su 'gro don tshar ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
NK040(thi)002:669: ngam shod smad kyi yul grong mtsho mer mer bya bar yab kher gad chos lha bya ba /
NK040(thi)002:670: yum phyugs mo 'bum lcam bya ba gnyis kyi lhums su zhugs pa'i lus po gcig yod do //
NK040(thi)002:671: ma'i lus la yod pa'i dus su zla ba gsum red tsa lus la sgron me steg pa rmis /
NK040(thi)002:672: zla ba drug red tsa khyim yang sgron mes gang ba rmis /
NK040(thi)002:673: zla ba dgu red tsa ngam shod kyi yul smad
NK040(thi)002:674: grong tsho mer mer bya ba sgron mes gang ba
NK040(thi)002:675: rmis / zla ba bcu ngo lon tsa ga te'i
NK040(thi)002:676: sngags dang ha ri ni sa'i sngags bzlo ba dang
NK040(thi)002:677: rmis / / ma brgyud kyi sngags bsgrang ba rnams mas thos nas yab la dris te /
NK040(thi)002:678: nga'i lus la yod pa de ni lha mi gang gis sprul pa yin mi shes /
NK040(thi)002:680: sngon nas yod pa de dang mi 'dra ba gcig byung zer /
NK040(thi)002:681: yab kyi ci 'dra ba gcig byung zer tsa /
NK040(thi)002:682: nga'i lus po nang du ga te'i sngags dang /
NK040(thi)002:683: ha ri ni sa'i sngags bzlo ba dang de 'dra ba grag zer /
NK040(thi)002:684: de nas yab kyis zer ba /
NK040(thi)002:685: ga ta'i sngags ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po yin /
NK040(thi)002:686: ha ri ni sa ni mkha' 'gro yongs rdzogs kyi snying po yin /
NK040(thi)002:687: bdud kyi sprul pa ni e bo yin /
NK040(thi)002:689: de nas zla ba bcu la btsas ste /
NK040(thi)002:690: mas bltas tsa sha mdog dkar ba gcig snang /
NK040(thi)002:691: dpral ba na spyan gsum snang /
NK040(thi)002:693: lce thog na yi ge h+r+aihdamara po gcig gis 'khor zhing snang ba mthong /
NK040(thi)002:694: mas blang bas mdzod kyis sgo phags su b+ha to
NK040(thi)002:695: hrul po gcig gis nang du bstum nas bzhag phyir
NK040(thi)002:696: nyin nyi ma shar dros tsa yab tsar phyin te
NK040(thi)002:697: / nga la khar song btsas pa de ni bu mo gcig snang /
NK040(thi)002:698: btsas ma thag na kha la a bgrang 'dug /
NK040(thi)002:699: dpral ba na mig gsum snang /
NK040(thi)002:700: lce thog na yi ge h+r+aihdamara po gcig 'khor snang /
NK040(thi)002:701: 'di mi ma yin gyi sprul pa e yin /
NK040(thi)002:702: 'o cag gnyis kyi nyams len la 'ong ba e yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:703: de nas yab kyis khyer la shog gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:705: yab kyis zer nas 'di gang yin shan ma phyed kyi bar mi la gsang ngo //
NK040(thi)002:706: khyed kyang sgor ma rgyug zer /
NK040(thi)002:707: ma yang zla ba gsum la ngo ma sprad nas
NK040(thi)002:708: gsos tsa skyed che la yid du 'ong ba gcig
NK040(thi)002:709: byung / mas yid du 'ong ba cig bzlas tsa yab yum gnyis kyi mtshan gsol nas /
NK040(thi)002:711: de nas lab lung de na 'khrugs pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:712: nad yam rnams kyang rgyun chad do //
NK040(thi)002:713: der lo bzhi lon nas pho mo gnyis dge bshes
NK040(thi)002:714: an ston gyi rtsar yod pa rab tu byung nas
NK040(thi)002:717: dge bshes an ston gyi zhal nas /
NK040(thi)002:718: 'bum me khyod kyi bu mo 'di la mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan rtags rnams tshang nas 'dug pas /
NK040(thi)002:720: chos skad bzang po gcig 'ong bar snang gsung /
NK040(thi)002:721: de nas yi ge bslab pas lo ngo bcu lon
NK040(thi)002:722: nas klog mkhas pa'i grags thog chod pa byung ngo
NK040(thi)002:723: // dge bshes rnams dang thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba gcig byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:724: de nas dbye'i phyi rol tu rgyal gyi ston mo gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:725: de'i dbus su thams cad ston mo la song bas /
NK040(thi)002:726: der 'dus pa'i khrom pa rnams kyi bu mo 'di gang nas 'ong ba yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:727: 'di ni lab bya ba nas 'ong ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:728: ma'i lus la yod pa'i dus su sgron me btegs pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:729: khyim sgron mes gang ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:730: lab lung pa yang sgron mes gang ba rmis skad /
NK040(thi)002:731: de nas khrom pa rnams kyis 'di 'ongs yang lab nas 'ong /
NK040(thi)002:733: da lab sgron ming thog zer /
NK040(thi)002:734: khrom pa rnams kyis ming lab sgron du gsol lo //
NK040(thi)002:735: de nas g.yu ru grwa thang du byon grwa pa
NK040(thi)002:736: mngon shes can gyi drung du rab tu byung nas
NK040(thi)002:737: btsun ma byas / grwa pa mngon shes can gyi
NK040(thi)002:738: tsar bka' rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum klag cing bsdad tsa
NK040(thi)002:739: btsun ma byas / / rgya pho ba grong 'jug kyi 'bum cha gcig klag /
NK040(thi)002:740: de'i nyin par grwa pa mngon shes can gyi gsungs pa /
NK040(thi)002:741: jo mo khyod dar zhwa 'di gyon la klog dang /
NK040(thi)002:742: chos skad bzang po gcig 'dug skad /
NK040(thi)002:743: ming yang jo mo zhwa chung can du btag /
NK040(thi)002:744: rgya pho ba drod 'jug gi klog skad dang /
NK040(thi)002:745: jo mo zhwa chung klog skad gnyis 'gyur gyi bzang zer nas thog chod pa byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:746: de nas g.yu ru grwa thang du /
NK040(thi)002:747: grwa pa mngon shes can gyi gzigs nas /
NK040(thi)002:749: rgyal gyi lha khang du rgya gar gyi a tsa ra gcig phyin zin zer ba'i skad cig grags /
NK040(thi)002:750: a tsa ras mngon shes kyis gzigs nas /
NK040(thi)002:751: rgya gar gyi yul ser skya'i grong khyer du skyes
NK040(thi)002:752: pa'i pan+di ta a tsa ra gcig po ta la'i
NK040(thi)002:753: ta la'i brag phug tu sgom zhing bzhugs tsa /
NK040(thi)002:754: mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar mo gcig gis lung bstan byas /
NK040(thi)002:755: de nas mkha' 'gro mas las mkhan byas nas bsgral /
NK040(thi)002:756: de'i tshe 'phos nas lab kyi lung par sku 'khrungs te /
NK040(thi)002:757: deng song grwa pa mngon shes can gyi drung rab tu byung nas /
NK040(thi)002:758: bla mchod byed cing yod par gzigs /
NK040(thi)002:759: de la sang nang par mjal du 'gro dgos bsam pa'i thugs dgongs cig byung /
NK040(thi)002:760: de nub jo mo'i rmi lam na /
NK040(thi)002:761: mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar mo cig byung bas /
NK040(thi)002:762: rgya gar nas byung ba'i a tsa ra gcig bod
NK040(thi)002:763: yul du 'gro don la byon pa de sang nang
NK040(thi)002:764: par mjal du 'ong bar yod gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:765: khong gi thugs la nga la a tsa ra mjal
NK040(thi)002:766: du 'ong ba 'di ci yin ang rmi lam la
NK040(thi)002:767: dgongs nas / khyod la mtshan jo mo bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:768: a tsa ra nag po de la dam pa rgya gar bya yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:769: de nas yar sad tsa ci yang mi snang skad /
NK040(thi)002:770: rmi lam 'khrul pa yin gyis 'dzin pa med do gsung skad /
NK040(thi)002:771: de nas phyi nang nyi ma shar tsa na g.yu
NK040(thi)002:772: ru grwa thang gi sgo chen la btug de byon
NK040(thi)002:773: tsa / dam pa yang rgyal gyi lha khang gra
NK040(thi)002:774: d+he'i 'phreng la nyug ste byon nas 'ong ba tug
NK040(thi)002:775: tsa / gis 'jal lo // phyag byas shing kha khar song /
NK040(thi)002:776: dbu gnyis stug res byas skad /
NK040(thi)002:777: jo mos gsungs nas dam pa bod yul du 'gro don la byon pa ngo mtshar che gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:779: khyed ye shes mkha' 'gro ma yin te /
NK040(thi)002:781: bod yul du 'gro don la byon pa ngo mtshar che /
NK040(thi)002:782: khyed kyi chos rgyud 'di dus mthar mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ltar 'ong ba yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:783: de na a tsa ra nag po dam pa rgya gar bod yul du grags pa yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:784: de nas a ma jo mo yang nang du byon nas /
NK040(thi)002:785: nyi khri klog pa'i skabs su gzigs rtogs mdzad nas
NK040(thi)002:786: bdud kyi le'u las blo gcig rtogs nas grol ste
NK040(thi)002:787: / rtogs pa khyad par can rgyud la skyes so //
NK040(thi)002:788: bka' thog nas grol ba'i grol lugs bka' dang mi 'gal ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig 'byung ste /
NK040(thi)002:789: dang po zas la phyogs ris med pa'i rtags su /
NK040(thi)002:790: sngar zas dkar gsum mngar gsum min par za ba la /
NK040(thi)002:791: de phyin chad mdze zas dang sprang zas za ba gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:792: gnyis pa gos kyi phyogs ris zhig pa'i rtags la /
NK040(thi)002:793: sngar chos gos dur smrig min pa mi gon pa la /
NK040(thi)002:794: phyis mdze gos dang sprang gos gyon pa gcig byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:795: gsum pa gnas kyi phyogs ris zhig pa'i rtags su /
NK040(thi)002:796: sngar gnas sde dgon min pa mi 'dug pa la /
NK040(thi)002:797: phyis mdze gnas dang sprang gnas lam 'phrang srang du 'dug pa gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:798: bzhi pa grogs kyis phyogs ris zhig pa'i rtags la /
NK040(thi)002:799: sngar mkhan slob dang mtshungs pa'i sde dang 'grogs pa la /
NK040(thi)002:800: phyis mdze sprang dang 'grogs pa gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:801: lnga pa yul gyi phyogs ris zhig pa'i rtags su /
NK040(thi)002:802: sngar mi chos kyi yul dbye'i lab dang /
NK040(thi)002:803: lha chos kyi yul g.yu ru gra thang du 'dug pa la /
NK040(thi)002:804: de phyin chad rgyal khams phyogs med du gshegs pa gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:805: de la bka' dngos dang mi 'gal ba nyi khri'i nang nas /
NK040(thi)002:806: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du gnyis su med
NK040(thi)002:807: de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha
NK040(thi)002:809: gzugs dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la gnyis su med do //
NK040(thi)002:810: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
NK040(thi)002:812: de nas dgung lo sum cu rtsa bdun lon tsa /
NK040(thi)002:813: bla ma rin po ches ngo sprod kyi brgyud pa ma chad pa /
NK040(thi)002:814: byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma chad pa /
NK040(thi)002:815: na bun ma yal ba yin skad /
NK040(thi)002:816: gnyis pa nye ba'i brgyud pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:817: a ma jo mo yan chad du chos spyi'i brgyud pa ni yod /
NK040(thi)002:818: gcod yul du grags pa'i brgyud pa ni med /
NK040(thi)002:819: a ma jo mo ni gang zag rang brgyud pa ma yin /
NK040(thi)002:820: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma yin /
NK040(thi)002:821: snyigs mar gdul byar dus la bab pa yin no //
NK040(thi)002:822: bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa'i bka' rgyas 'bring gzigs rtogs mang du mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:823: rtogs pa khyad par can brgyud la skyes /
NK040(thi)002:824: de nas grwa pa mngon shes can la dbang gcig
NK040(thi)002:825: zhu byas tsa ngas khyod la dbang bskur mi nus
NK040(thi)002:826: / dbang skyo ston bsod nams bla ma la zhus zer nas lung bstan /
NK040(thi)002:827: de la bar chad mi 'ong ngam byas pas mi 'ong gsung /
NK040(thi)002:828: de la brten nas skyabs 'gro yan lag brgyad pa mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:829: phyis skyo ston bsod nams bla dang mjal nas 'bul
NK040(thi)002:830: ba chen po byas te nga la dbang bskur gcig
NK040(thi)002:831: zhu zhus pas / grwa pa mngon shes can gyi lung bstan yin zhus /
NK040(thi)002:832: dge bshes kyi snod ldan du gzigs nas dbye'i lha khang du dbang bzhi rdzogs par gnang /
NK040(thi)002:833: de'i nub mo jo mos lus khru gang gi sa
NK040(thi)002:834: la ma reg par zhi ba'i gar thab nyi shu
NK040(thi)002:835: rtsa gcig mdzad / gsung sam tri ta'i skad mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:836: thugs thog pa med pa ting nge 'dzin du ma mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:837: khang pa'i gyang la thog pa med par tal gyi byon nas /
NK040(thi)002:838: sdong po gser glag can du klu rgyal drag po
NK040(thi)002:839: lag skyongs bya ba gnas par thog pa med pa'i
NK040(thi)002:841: klu drag po lag skyongs na re /
NK040(thi)002:842: sngar 'di 'dra ba'i chos brgyud yod ma myong /
NK040(thi)002:843: khyod sha la dga' ba'i klu rigs rnams 'dir 'dus
NK040(thi)002:844: dang zer nas klu rnams kyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs
NK040(thi)002:845: bstan / khong gi lus po sbyin par btang /
NK040(thi)002:846: sems chos nyid gter du sbas /
NK040(thi)002:847: klu rnams kyis cho 'phrul ji ltar bstan kyang ma tshugs /
NK040(thi)002:848: klu rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:849: bskor ba byed pa byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:851: tho ras skya ring shar ba'i dus su thams cad rje btsun sgrol ma'i zhal gzigs /
NK040(thi)002:852: lab kyi sgron ma khyod chu mig gnyan khrod brgya rtsa brgyad la bsgrub pa mthar skyol dang /
NK040(thi)002:853: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:854: gzhan yang lung bstan mang du mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:855: phyir nang mched grogs rnams tshol du phyin te bla ma'i drung du khrid nas /
NK040(thi)002:856: mdangs jo mos dbang ma thob byas tsa /
NK040(thi)002:857: bla ma'i zhal nas mdangs 'dus byas rdzas kyi dbang de khyed rnams kyi thob /
NK040(thi)002:858: chos nyid don gyi dbang de jo mo 'dis thob gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:859: dge bshes dbyen ston las yang rdzogs chen gyi chos skor rnams gsan no //
NK040(thi)002:860: grwa pha mngon shes can las phar phyin gyi zhal bka' gdam gyi chos rnams gsan no //
NK040(thi)002:861: dge bshes shud bu zhwa dmar can la dbang sems sgom gyi skor rnams gsan no //
NK040(thi)002:862: dge bshes yang rtse ba las phyag rgya chen po'i skor rnams gsan no //
NK040(thi)002:863: de rnams kyi nang nas dge bshes bsod nams bla ma de rtsa ba'i bla ma yin no //
NK040(thi)002:864: thos bsam gyi sgro 'dog kyang de tsam gcig bcad /
NK040(thi)002:865: lo sum cu rtsa gsum tshun chad la btsun ma'i gra thog chod pa gcig byas so //
NK040(thi)002:866: sum cu rtsa gsum lon pa'i dus dbye chung na /
NK040(thi)002:867: yon bdag lha mo sgron bya ba gcig dang bza'
NK040(thi)002:868: mi gnyis rab chad du 'dug pas zas nor gang
NK040(thi)002:869: yod chos la btang zhing snang /
NK040(thi)002:870: khong gis 'bum dang nyi khri klog nas yod tsa
NK040(thi)002:871: yul phyogs de na thod pa b+ha re bya ba
NK040(thi)002:872: gcig snang / de yon bdag gi cho ga la snyag /
NK040(thi)002:873: de'i lo rgyus cung zad tsam bshad na /
NK040(thi)002:874: rgya gar yul du skyes pa'i pan+di ta cig bod yul du byon pa yin skad /
NK040(thi)002:875: dbye'i rab kha bya bar sku 'khrungs yab ni rat+na sid+d+hi bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:876: yum ni sa ma ti bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:877: mtshan ni b+ha re bya bar grags yin /
NK040(thi)002:878: yon bdag de'i rtsar jo mos klog byas /
NK040(thi)002:879: b+ha re cho ga byas tsa b+ha ra yang cho ga byed mi 'dod pa ha re lta 'dug /
NK040(thi)002:881: brten pa cho ga mi mdzad ci yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:882: ngas cho ga byed snying mi 'dod pa cig 'dug zer /
NK040(thi)002:883: blo bde 'bol le song skad yon bdag mo na re /
NK040(thi)002:884: nged bza' mi gnyis kyang de 'dra zer /
NK040(thi)002:886: khong na re ci yang ma yin jo mo 'di byin rlabs can gcig 'dug pas /
NK040(thi)002:888: rang cag rnams la byin rlabs kyi 'od zer phog pa yin skad /
NK040(thi)002:889: de'i nub mo mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dmar mo
NK040(thi)002:890: dpral ba na mig yod pa gcig gis jo mo
NK040(thi)002:891: khyod cho ga mkhan po 'di dang sngon gyi smon
NK040(thi)002:892: lam dang / da ltar gyi las 'phro mthun pas thabs shes rab mdzod cig gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:893: ngas btsun ma grag thog chod pas de 'dra ba byas na mis mi 'bar ram zhus pas /
NK040(thi)002:894: sku mdog dmar mo de dkar mo gcig tu gyur nas /
NK040(thi)002:895: 'gro ba'i don 'byung ba yin pas da res phyir mi ldog ste /
NK040(thi)002:896: mkha' spyod kyi gnas su phyin pa yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:897: gzhan yang lung bstan mang du mdzad nas 'ja' dang 'od du yal nas thal /
NK040(thi)002:898: de'i phyir nyin 'ba' re byung nas phyag dang bskor ba mang du byas /
NK040(thi)002:899: nub mo mun rub tsa khong gi rtsar phyin pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:900: khyed kyi klog 'don mdzad pa'i byin rlabs dang /
NK040(thi)002:901: gsungs dri ma med pa'i byin rlabs dang /
NK040(thi)002:903: sangs rgyas kyi thugs gi bden pa rnams kyis byin rlabs nga la zhu zer /
NK040(thi)002:904: jo mos nyi khri dum pa gcig mgo la bzhag cing /
NK040(thi)002:906: nga la thog pa med pa'i byin rlabs cig zhu zer /
NK040(thi)002:907: b+ha re la shed kyi ma thub nas thog tu
NK040(thi)002:908: bsdad tsa yon bdag mo chos la mar me skyel
NK040(thi)002:909: du byung nas / a ma jo mo yang 'dul
NK040(thi)002:910: khrims gtsang zer ba bdud kyis bslus pa ma lags
NK040(thi)002:911: du byung nas / sam zer / khong la rkang
NK040(thi)002:912: mthil nas sbrid cig byung ba de spyi gtsug tu
NK040(thi)002:913: sing gi bud nas thal te /
NK040(thi)002:914: jo mos tshig bcad byas nas gsungs pa /
NK040(thi)002:915: lung bstan phal cher bdud kyi bslus pa yin //
NK040(thi)002:916: pho mo gnyis 'grogs bdud kyis khyer ba yin //
NK040(thi)002:917: yon bdag mo yang rkyen gyis ded pa yin //
NK040(thi)002:918: 'gro ba'i don yang ci nus ngas mi shes //
NK040(thi)002:920: yon bdag mos ni mo rang gi mi la yang ma bzlas zin /
NK040(thi)002:921: b+ha re yang zhag bdun la cho ga byas /
NK040(thi)002:922: jo mos zla ba gcig la 'bum tshar bcu gsum bklag /
NK040(thi)002:923: de nas jo mo la yon 'ga' re rdzong nas /
NK040(thi)002:924: g.yu ru gra thang du gra pa mngon shes can la 'bul ba byas nas zhus /
NK040(thi)002:925: gra pa mngon shes can gyi jo mo zhwa chung
NK040(thi)002:926: can khyod nga'i drung du byung nas 'dul khrims gtsang
NK040(thi)002:927: / sngon gyi las kyi b+ha re zer ba dang sngon gyi las 'phro mthun pas /
NK040(thi)002:928: las kyi 'brel ba yin pas zhum pa ma byed cig gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:929: de nas skyo ston bsod nams bla mas mjal du phyin /
NK040(thi)002:931: thang cig nga phyogs med du 'gro zer /
NK040(thi)002:932: b+ha re bya ba'i cho ga mkhan po gcig gis nga la gnag nas yod pas /
NK040(thi)002:933: dbus kyi khrom pa tshos 'bar nas snang /
NK040(thi)002:934: gtam ngan rlung zhon bya ba yin skad /
NK040(thi)002:935: mdang gi rmi lam la khyed kyis 'gro don phyogs
NK040(thi)002:936: med la 'byung ba yin zhum pa ma byed gsungs
NK040(thi)002:937: / de nas jo mos rtsa ba'i bla ma gnyis
NK040(thi)002:938: kyis de gsungs bsam nas zhum pa ma byas te
NK040(thi)002:939: / / jo mo bka' log ma zer te kun gyi 'bar sha byed pa byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:940: dus thang cig dbus su mi 'dug nas /
NK040(thi)002:941: nyang dag kong gsum la 'gro dgos bsam pa gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:942: de nas kong yul la byon /
NK040(thi)002:943: bu gsum yod pa'i che ba la grub se /
NK040(thi)002:946: kong yul du jo mos klog byas /
NK040(thi)002:947: b+ha res cho ga byas der lo mang du bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:948: der lo lnga bcu red nas b+ha re pha yul
NK040(thi)002:949: du 'ongs nas bu nor thams cad der bzhag go
NK040(thi)002:950: // de nas dbus gtsang gis rgyal khams phyogs med du byon /
NK040(thi)002:951: la stod ding rir byon nas dam pa rgya gar dang mjal du byon /
NK040(thi)002:952: dam pa mngon shes can gyis gzigs nas /
NK040(thi)002:953: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma lab kyi sgron ma byon par gda' gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:954: ding ri ba rnams bsu ba la byon /
NK040(thi)002:955: de nas ding rir zhag gsum bzhugs /
NK040(thi)002:956: dam pa dang nyams bsdur mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:957: dam pa yang thugs mnyes te ma jo mo khyod
NK040(thi)002:958: kyi bstan pa ni yun ring du 'byung gis gsungs
NK040(thi)002:959: / de nas zangs ri mkhar dmar du byon te /
NK040(thi)002:960: yon bdag mo chos mtsho bya ba gcig gis /
NK040(thi)002:961: lus ni btsun mar 'dug ste chos ni mi shes par snang /
NK040(thi)002:962: gnya' na ri dmar po zangs ri 'dra ba gcig snang /
NK040(thi)002:963: gzhi bdag de'i ming la zangs ri 'khyil pa btag /
NK040(thi)002:964: yon bdag mo de'i tsar bzhugs cing yod tsa na /
NK040(thi)002:965: srod la gzhi bdag de byung nas jo mo khyod kyi mtshan lab sgron du snang /
NK040(thi)002:966: steng yar de la dur khrod yod sa de la dgon sa thob la sdod dang /
NK040(thi)002:967: ngas kyang yon bdag byed pa yin skad /
NK040(thi)002:968: mi dmar rta dmar can cig byung ba de zangs ri'i gzhi bdag yin par snang /
NK040(thi)002:969: mkhar 'di la mkhar dmar bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:970: jo mo btsun ma 'di'i bdag po yin /
NK040(thi)002:971: ri pha ri de la nga 'dug sa yin /
NK040(thi)002:972: 'di gnyis kyi bar la bzhugs mdzod dang zer nas lung bstan skad /
NK040(thi)002:973: khong gi dgongs pa la b+ha re nged gnyis kyi
NK040(thi)002:974: lung bstan dang e mi 'dra dgongs nas 'khor ba'i
NK040(thi)002:975: sdug bsngal 'ga' zhig kyang dran pa byung /
NK040(thi)002:976: khrom pa'i mi rnams kyi 'bar sha byung nas snyems mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:977: de'i phyir nang yon bdag mo de byung nas nged
NK040(thi)002:978: gnyis kyi gzhi bdag pha ri de khyed la bzang
NK040(thi)002:980: ci 'dra byas pas btsun mas gzhi bdag de rmis na bzang ba gcig yin /
NK040(thi)002:981: mdang gi rmi lam la gzhi bdag de byung nas /
NK040(thi)002:982: thog na yod pa'i jo mo de lab sgrol ma bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:983: khyod kyis yon bdag gyis la zhabs tog gyis dang /
NK040(thi)002:984: ngas kyang gdongs grogs byed skad /
NK040(thi)002:985: khong gis gzhi bdag de ci 'dra ba yin byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:986: mi dmar rta dmar gcig yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:988: thog kha ya ta na bzhugs dang btsun ma ngas zhabs tog byed zer nas khas blangs /
NK040(thi)002:989: de nas khong gi dgon gnas mdzad nas bzhugs pas /
NK040(thi)002:990: lo gsum tsa na bstan pa nam mkha' la nyi ma shar 'dra gcig byung /
NK040(thi)002:992: zangs ri mkhar dmar la ma cig lab sgron bzhugs zer nas bzang dgu'i btug sa /
NK040(thi)002:993: ngan dgu'i rten sa byung skad /
NK040(thi)002:994: dus de tsa na rgya chos dang /
NK040(thi)002:995: bod chos gnyis kyi ngos bzung ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:996: gnam chos dang sa chos gnyis kyi ngos bzung ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:997: bka' ma dang gter ma gnyis kyi ngos bzung ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:998: pho gcod dang mo gcod gnyis kyi ngos bzung ba dang bzhi'o //
NK040(thi)002:999: de la chos 'di'i brgyud pa bshad na /
NK040(thi)002:1000: rgya chos bod chos gnyis kyi ngos bzung ni /
NK040(thi)002:1001: chos rgya gar nas bod la dar ba yin te /
NK040(thi)002:1002: bod kyi chos rgya gar na grags pa yang yod gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1003: rgya gar rdo rje gdan du thams cad 'dus nas
NK040(thi)002:1004: chos thams cad rgya gar nas bod du grags pa
NK040(thi)002:1005: yin / bod la chos med pa ci 'dra yin zer nas /
NK040(thi)002:1006: bdud kyi bslu ba e yin zer nas /
NK040(thi)002:1007: ming la phyag rgya chen po grags pa'i gcod zer ba gcig yod zer ba ci 'dra yin /
NK040(thi)002:1008: rkang mgyogs pa gsum 'gro dgos zer nas thams cad gros byas /
NK040(thi)002:1010: khra hor pa gong sang 'grim pa tsam cig byung
NK040(thi)002:1011: ba zhag gnyis tsa zangs ri mkhar dmar du ma'i
NK040(thi)002:1012: drung du phyin / rgya gar gyi a tsa ra gsum bla dbyer phyin zer ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:1013: ma'i zhal nas a tsa ra gsum gzugs ci 'dra ba gcig snang /
NK040(thi)002:1014: gos ci 'dra ba gon zin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1015: nye gnas na re a tsa ra gzhan gyi gos ma gon zin /
NK040(thi)002:1016: dar gyi la'u gsum gon zin /
NK040(thi)002:1018: rgya gar gyi rkang mgyogs pa gsum byung zer nas /
NK040(thi)002:1019: a tsa ras rgya gar gyi skad byed pa lo ts+wa med /
NK040(thi)002:1020: ma'i tsar shog zer nas 'tsho ba drangs /
NK040(thi)002:1021: bgro gleng byas tsa mas rgya gar gyi skad 'gyur thams cad gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1022: a tsa ras khyod bod kyis rgya gar gyi skad 'gyur shes pa ci yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:1023: ma'i zhal nas tshe sngon ma rgya gar na skyes pa yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:1024: a tsa ras skye ba dran pa yin nam gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1025: mas skye ba snga phyi da gsum dran gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1026: a tsa ras khyod shog zer /
NK040(thi)002:1027: ma'i thugs kyi dgongs pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1028: a tsa ra 'di gsum gyi rgya skad du gtam pas /
NK040(thi)002:1029: nga'i grwa slob rnams kyi mi go /
NK040(thi)002:1030: khong gsum las shag kha nga rgyal yang dgos ba chung bsam pa byung /
NK040(thi)002:1031: a tsa ra gsum gyi rgya brang kha phyes skad /
NK040(thi)002:1032: zhabs thog byas dbus gtsang ru bzhi'i mkhas btsun rnams dang /
NK040(thi)002:1034: phyogs phyogs kyis grwa bskor ba rnams dang /
NK040(thi)002:1036: rgya gar dang bod kyi lo ts+wa ba rnams dang /
NK040(thi)002:1037: kun la pho nya btang nas bsdus /
NK040(thi)002:1039: de nas mchod pa chen po bshams /
NK040(thi)002:1040: ston mo dang spong thag byas nas /
NK040(thi)002:1041: 'tshogs pa de'i gong du a tsa ra gsum dang bgro gleng gis bshad pa btang ste /
NK040(thi)002:1042: dbus gtsang gnyis kyi sa cha la lo ts+wa ba bzhi byung ste /
NK040(thi)002:1043: 'tshogs pa de la lo ts+wa bas bsgyur nas /
NK040(thi)002:1044: ma'i chos rnams snyem thag chod par 'dug gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1045: a tsa ra gsum gyis gsungs nas /
NK040(thi)002:1046: chos thams cad rgya gar nas ma byung ba'i bod la chos med zer /
NK040(thi)002:1047: ma'i zhal nas rgya gar ba 'di bod la drin che /
NK040(thi)002:1048: chos thams cad rgya gar gyi chos dar lugs de khyod gsum gyis shod dang zer /
NK040(thi)002:1049: a tsa ras dar lugs ngas mi shes zer /
NK040(thi)002:1050: khyed kyis shes pa i yin zer /
NK040(thi)002:1052: nga ni yum gyi thugs sprul yin pas shes gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1053: rgya gar chos kyi rgyal po dza zhes bya ba
NK040(thi)002:1054: bzhugs pa'i dus su gdam ngag dang gsang sngags kyi
NK040(thi)002:1055: rgyud thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:1056: de yang yum gyi byin rlabs yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1057: de nas a tsa ra gsum gyis khyod skye ba snga phyi dran zer ba yong shod /
NK040(thi)002:1058: chos 'di'i brgyud pa yang shod zer ba lo ts+wa bas bsgyur skad /
NK040(thi)002:1060: 'o skol 'dir tshogs pa'i khrom pa rnams gson dang /
NK040(thi)002:1061: 'tshogs gong 'di la skye ba snga phyi da gsum gyi skye lugs shod zer bas /
NK040(thi)002:1062: skyes pa'i lugs ma bshad na /
NK040(thi)002:1063: nga'i brgyud pa 'dzin pa 'di rnams yid mi ches /
NK040(thi)002:1064: phyag rgya chen po bdud kyi gcod yul 'di'i brgyud pa ma bshad na /
NK040(thi)002:1065: gdam ngag la yid mi ches /
NK040(thi)002:1066: rgya gar rdo rje gdan la thams cad 'dus nas /
NK040(thi)002:1067: chos thams cad rgya gar la 'ong ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1068: phyag rgya chen po bdud kyi gcod yul 'di rgya gar la mi grags bod du grags pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1069: bod la bdud dang rgyal bsen sdong nas bod brlag pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:1070: rgya gar gyis chos thams cad bsnub chis e yin /
NK040(thi)002:1072: zer nas rkang mgyogs pa 'di gsum btang zin pas /
NK040(thi)002:1073: chos 'di'i brgyud pa bshad pa yin pas nyon cig gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1074: de'i nyin par bka' tshom chen mo zhib rgyas su bshad /
NK040(thi)002:1075: yang le'u lag sa ma ti 'grel pa sam kri ti'i skad du gcod yul zla ba gcig bshad /
NK040(thi)002:1076: dbus gtsang mdo khams rnams dang /
NK040(thi)002:1077: der tshogs kyi khrom pa rnams yid ches /
NK040(thi)002:1078: tshig gi sgro bkur chod pa byung /
NK040(thi)002:1079: de nas ma'i skyes rab gsungs ste /
NK040(thi)002:1080: dang po yum gyi thugs sprul yin te /
NK040(thi)002:1081: sum cu rtsa gsum dga' ldan lha gnas nas /
NK040(thi)002:1082: gling chen po gdal skyob bya ba'i lho phyogs nas /
NK040(thi)002:1083: nor bu phun tshogs kyi gling zhes bya ba yod de /
NK040(thi)002:1084: yum gyi thugs kyi 'dul ba'i gling yin /
NK040(thi)002:1085: de ru skyes pa'i yab ni rgyal po bde skyong bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1086: yum bal mo mtsho bya ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1087: de gnyis kyi sras su sku 'khrungs ste /
NK040(thi)002:1088: lha'i yul du 'gro don yun ring du byas /
NK040(thi)002:1089: de nas rdo rje gdan du lha rnams ltad mo la byon te /
NK040(thi)002:1090: lha'i yul du 'gro don rdzogs pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1091: rdo rje gdan du 'gro don dgos pas der 'dzoms nas /
NK040(thi)002:1092: 'ja' dang 'od kyi tshul du skye ba bzhes /
NK040(thi)002:1093: de nas rdo rje gdan gyi ser skya'i grong khyer du 'gro don byas te /
NK040(thi)002:1094: yab ni a yi dbang phyug /
NK040(thi)002:1095: yum ni lha za klu sgron ma bya ba gnyis kyis sras su sku 'khrungs /
NK040(thi)002:1096: mtshan yang smon lam grub du btags /
NK040(thi)002:1097: rgya gar gyi mu stegs pa thams cad btul nas nang pa'i sde la bkod /
NK040(thi)002:1098: yab yum gyis gshegs rdzong byas /
NK040(thi)002:1099: thos bsam gyis sgro 'dog der bcad /
NK040(thi)002:1100: po ta'i ri la pa tra'i brag phug du bsgoms
NK040(thi)002:1101: zhing bzhugs tsa mkha' 'gro mas las mkhan byas nas
NK040(thi)002:1102: / nga'i bem rig phral bas nga'i lus de brag phug de'i nang du yod pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1103: mgo la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu byas pa'i
NK040(thi)002:1104: rigs lnga la ye shes kyis mkha' 'gro lngas 'khril
NK040(thi)002:1105: sbyor byas pa sku zhi ba'i tshul du dod nas
NK040(thi)002:1106: yod / nga'i snying de la sh+aakya thub pa rang byon du byon nas yod /
NK040(thi)002:1107: nga'i rus bu de la gdung sha ri ram sran ma tsam 'bum /
NK040(thi)002:1108: de min ring srel kha dog sna lnga tshangs ba
NK040(thi)002:1109: rgya gar rdo rje gdan gyi bre tshad ma gang
NK040(thi)002:1110: byon nas yod / 'dir yang bod kyi yul du 'gro don byed pa 'di ka yin /
NK040(thi)002:1111: 'gro don phyed tshar tsam la phyin nas yod /
NK040(thi)002:1112: lo yang drug cu rtsa gsum red /
NK040(thi)002:1113: dgu bcu go dgu la phyin tsa nub phyogs u
NK040(thi)002:1114: rgyan gyi gnas su 'gro don rdzogs nas thar pa
NK040(thi)002:1115: thob / srin po'i grong khyer kha mi brgyud gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1116: de nas der tshogs pa rnams kyi gros byas nas /
NK040(thi)002:1117: rgya gar gyi rkang mgyogs pa gsum po de rdo rje gdan du song nas /
NK040(thi)002:1118: rgya gar chos kyi rgyal po dang /
NK040(thi)002:1119: pin+di ta de rnams 'dus nas thams cad kun la ma cig gis gdams pa'i brgyud lugs dang /
NK040(thi)002:1121: ma yi skye ba'i lo rgyus dang /
NK040(thi)002:1122: po ta'i ri la pa tra'i brag phug nang khang
NK040(thi)002:1123: gi gdung rus kyi lo rgyus 'bri bkol med par
NK040(thi)002:1124: zhus so // rgya gar chos kyi rgyal po dang /
NK040(thi)002:1125: pan+di ta rnams kyi zhal nas 'di'i chos brgyud des yang na yum gyi thugs sprul yin nges /
NK040(thi)002:1126: yang na rgyal bsen gyi cho 'phrul e yin /
NK040(thi)002:1127: 'di gang yin cha med gdams pa rnams gud du ma lus pa len dgos /
NK040(thi)002:1128: pa ta la'i ri la pa tra'i brag phug tu song la e bden ltos gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1129: pan+di ta mang du tshogs nas song nas ltas tsa /
NK040(thi)002:1130: lab sgron gyis gsung pa bzhin snang skad /
NK040(thi)002:1131: gdan drangs nas rdo rje gdan du phyin te /
NK040(thi)002:1132: rgya gar chos kyis rgyal pos phyogs phyogs su rkang mgyogs pa btang nas thams cad 'dus so //
NK040(thi)002:1133: der 'dus pa thams cad la rten rnams bstan pas thams cad ngo mtshar skyes so //
NK040(thi)002:1134: bdud dang rgyal bsen ma byung bas /
NK040(thi)002:1135: 'di'i chos brgyud gdan drong gsungs nas gros 'chams so //
NK040(thi)002:1136: gdung rus kyi ring bsrel la ma ga d+ha'i bre tshad ma gang snang /
NK040(thi)002:1137: rgya gar gyi rgyal po de'i re re la bdun
NK040(thi)002:1138: cha re dad pa'i rten la bgos tsa ring srel
NK040(thi)002:1139: yang zad / rgya gar gyi rgyal po thams cad kyang tshims pa gcig byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:1140: dbu la rigs lnga'i sku byon pa de rdo rje gdan du bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:1141: rgya gar chos kyi rgyal po'i dad pa'i rten mdzad do //
NK040(thi)002:1142: thugs la sh+aakya thub pa byon pa de bod yul byin rlabs zhu ba'i rten dang /
NK040(thi)002:1143: mdo khams dbus gsum du tshig tha snyad kyi sgro 'dog gcod pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1144: skye ba snga phyi da gsum gyi bden pa'i ngo bo ston pa'i phyir /
NK040(thi)002:1145: bod yul dbus su gdan drangs pa lags so //
NK040(thi)002:1146: dam pa rgya gar dang rkang mgyogs pa gsum dang
NK040(thi)002:1147: bzhi po de zangs ri mkhar dmar du ma yi
NK040(thi)002:1149: pus mo btsug bskor ba byas /
NK040(thi)002:1151: khyod yum chen thugs sprul ngo mtshar che /
NK040(thi)002:1152: zhal nas ci ltar gsungs pa'i rgyud rnams la tshig gcig kyang nor 'khrul mi 'dug skad /
NK040(thi)002:1153: thugs la byon pa'i sh+aakya thub pa de mdo dbus
NK040(thi)002:1154: khams gsum tshogs pa rnams la zhal bstan byin rlabs
NK040(thi)002:1156: nga'i thugs rten byed pa yin gsungs nas gdan drangs so //
NK040(thi)002:1157: de nas phyogs thams cad kyi ngo mtshar che zer nas kun dang sa la btsud do //
NK040(thi)002:1158: kun gyi sgro bkur dang gshe ba mi byed nas snyem thag chod do //
NK040(thi)002:1159: 'dzam bu'i gling du dam chos bdud kyi gcod yul dar ro //
NK040(thi)002:1160: ma jo mo'i bstan pa ni nam mkha' la nyi ma shar ba bzhin du song /
NK040(thi)002:1161: de nas rgya gar rdo rje gdan ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:1162: chos thams cad rgya gar nas 'byung ste /
NK040(thi)002:1163: lab sgron nga'i chos brgyud 'di bod yul gyi dbus su bzang ri mkhar dmar nas /
NK040(thi)002:1164: rgya gar na bod kyi chos 'di dar ba gcig byed dgos snyam nas /
NK040(thi)002:1165: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyams su len na /
NK040(thi)002:1166: dam chos bdud kyi gcod yul 'di la yid ches
NK040(thi)002:1167: par byed pa'i lo rgyus kyi don la bzhi ste
NK040(thi)002:1168: / pha brgyud brda'i brgyud pa dang gcig /
NK040(thi)002:1169: ma brgyud byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa dang gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:1170: snying po don gyi brgyud pa dang gsum /
NK040(thi)002:1171: bka' thog nas grol ba nyams kyi brgyud pa dang bzhi'o //
NK040(thi)002:1172: de'ang pha brgyud ni thab gtso cher ston /
NK040(thi)002:1173: ma brgyud ni shes rab gtso cher ston /
NK040(thi)002:1174: snying po don gyi brgyud pa ni gnyis med don gyi bde ba chen po gtso cher ston /
NK040(thi)002:1175: bka' thog nas grol ba nyams kyi brgyud pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1176: a ma jo mo'i nyams myong brgyud la skyes pa'i don mngon du gyur ste /
NK040(thi)002:1177: bka' dang mi 'ga' ba'i grol lugs so //
NK040(thi)002:1178: a ma jo mo'i brgyud pa 'di la yang /
NK040(thi)002:1179: ring brgyud dang nye brgyud gnyis las /
NK040(thi)002:1180: ring brgyud kyi dbang du byas na /
NK040(thi)002:1181: yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mas drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen la brgyud /
NK040(thi)002:1182: des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1183: des 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng+ge la /
NK040(thi)002:1185: des dam pa rgya gar la /
NK040(thi)002:1186: des skyo ston bsod nams bla ma /
NK040(thi)002:1187: des skye med zangs thal la /
NK040(thi)002:1189: thugs dam rje btsun sgrol ma /
NK040(thi)002:1190: des ma cig lab sgron la /
NK040(thi)002:1191: des sras ming sring gsum la brgyud pa lags so //
NK040(thi)002:1192: de rnams rgya chos bod la bsgyur ba'o //
NK040(thi)002:1193: bod chos rgya la bsgyur ba ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1194: dbus nas yar la bka' brgyud don gyi brgyud lugs dang /
NK040(thi)002:1196: mkha' 'gro nyams kyi gdams ngag dang /
NK040(thi)002:1197: gzhi lam slong bya ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:1198: phyi bka' tshom zhib rgyas bya ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:1199: nang mkho dgu'i le'u lag gnad kyi them yig bya ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:1200: gsang ba brda chos la bzla'i skor bya ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:1201: sgom pa zhal gdam gnad thebs su bstan pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1204: chos ngo mtshar can rgyud bcu rgya gar gyi rkang
NK040(thi)002:1205: mgyogs pa gsum la rgya gar rdo rje gdan du
NK040(thi)002:1206: bsgyur / rgya gar rdo rje gdan du chos rnams rgyun du dar nas yod /
NK040(thi)002:1207: bod chos rgya gar du grags pa'i gtan tshig de ltar lags so //
NK040(thi)002:1208: sa chos gnam chos gnyis kyi ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1209: chos kyi rgyud thams cad rgya gar du char du babs /
NK040(thi)002:1211: gsang sngags kyis chos brgyud gnam chos yin /
NK040(thi)002:1212: sa chos ni gter ma thams cad yin te /
NK040(thi)002:1213: sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba'i don du sbas pa yin no //
NK040(thi)002:1214: bka' ma gter ma gnyis kyi chos ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1215: bka' thog nas grol ba nyams kyi brgyud yin /
NK040(thi)002:1216: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang mi'agala ba gsungs pas /
NK040(thi)002:1218: pho gcod mo gcod gnyis kyi ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1219: pho gcod ni pha brgyud brda' las bsgyur ba tsam /
NK040(thi)002:1220: mo gcod ni yum gyi thugs sprul te /
NK040(thi)002:1221: ma cig lab sgron la mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du bstan cing /
NK040(thi)002:1222: snyan du brgyud pa lags so //
NK040(thi)002:1223: de nas yum gyi sras la brgyud pa lags so //
NK040(thi)002:1227: grub se bya ba ni sras thod pa don grub
NK040(thi)002:1228: bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling du grags pa yin no
NK040(thi)002:1229: // grub chung bya ba ni lo bcu lon tshe gza' nad phog ste smyo rgyal du song /
NK040(thi)002:1230: thod pa b+ha res zangs ri mkhar dmar du ma'i drung du bskyal /
NK040(thi)002:1231: mas snod ldan du dgongs nas de nub kyi rmi
NK040(thi)002:1232: lam la ma'i phyogs bzhir dung dkar bus tsa gling
NK040(thi)002:1234: de'i phyir nyin sras sleb nas phyin /
NK040(thi)002:1235: bka' brgyud 'dzin pa'i snod ldan du gzigs nas ma'i gsungs pa'i dmigs pa brgya rtsa brgyad bstan /
NK040(thi)002:1236: dur khrod du zhag bdun nyal bas smyo rgyal gyi nad kyang sos skad /
NK040(thi)002:1237: de nas dam pa rgya gar zangs ri mkhar dmar du gdan drangs /
NK040(thi)002:1240: kho yi pha de thod pa b+ha re yin /
NK040(thi)002:1241: smyo rgyal byas nas 'di ru khrid nas phyin /
NK040(thi)002:1242: dam pa rgya gar dang mjal /
NK040(thi)002:1244: ming yang thod smyon bsam 'grub tu btags /
NK040(thi)002:1245: de nas ma'i thugs la gang yod pa'i gdam pa rnams bstan /
NK040(thi)002:1246: dbang rin chen spung pa'i brgyud /
NK040(thi)002:1248: ma brgyud mkha' 'gro'i gter ma rin chen spungs pa'i dbang /
NK040(thi)002:1249: ma'i thugs la gang yod rnams gnang nas lung bstan /
NK040(thi)002:1250: sham po'i gang la phug mo'i dben gnas su song /
NK040(thi)002:1251: bsgrub pa skor 'di rnams nyams su longs la bsgrub
NK040(thi)002:1252: pa lo bcu gsum la 'dag char la sdod gsungs
NK040(thi)002:1253: / 'tsho ba drangs pa'i yon bdag zhig kyang ngas gtong /
NK040(thi)002:1255: ba men gyi lhung zed gcig kyang thogs su bcol /
NK040(thi)002:1256: gdams ngag snyan brgyud bskor rnams thugs su chud par byas /
NK040(thi)002:1257: gzhan gdam ngag gi skor dpung chung ba rnams thugs
NK040(thi)002:1258: su chud par byin nas grogs po bzhi dang 'grogs
NK040(thi)002:1259: nas btang / khyed bzhis khong brag phug nang du
NK040(thi)002:1260: chug la sgo pha bong rnams kyis chod la zhog
NK040(thi)002:1263: ma cig gis seng+ge dkar mo la bcibs nas mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pas bskor nas /
NK040(thi)002:1264: sham po'i phug mo gang la byon nas brgyud dbang mdzad nas yod tsa /
NK040(thi)002:1265: rnal 'byor pa lnga yang sleb nas phyin /
NK040(thi)002:1266: sham po'i gangs la su'ang med gsungs tsa spos ngad dang /
NK040(thi)002:1267: lha cha'i sgra dang mi mang po yang snang /
NK040(thi)002:1268: 'dir yang sgrub pa mthar skyol ba gcig yod pa ngo mtshar che bsam pa byung /
NK040(thi)002:1269: de yang sgor phyin tsa bud med rgyan ldan gcig byung nas /
NK040(thi)002:1270: rnal 'byor pa la nang du byon gsungs nas nang
NK040(thi)002:1271: du phyin tsa seng+ge'i khri steng na ma cig lab
NK040(thi)002:1272: sgron dang 'khor mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs
NK040(thi)002:1273: zin / ma gcig gi zhal nas /
NK040(thi)002:1276: bka' bstan bcos kyi brgyud dang bcas pa zhus gcig skad /
NK040(thi)002:1277: de nas thod smyon bsam 'grub la brgyud pa'i dbang dang /
NK040(thi)002:1280: snyan brgyud kyi lung thams cad bkrol nas dbang mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:1281: bka' brgyud kyi byin brlabs dang bcas pa'i dbang mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:1282: byin phab sham po'i gzhi bdag dam la btags te /
NK040(thi)002:1284: gzhi bdag gis kyang bar chod mi 'byung zhing sdong grogs byed par zhal gyis bzhes /
NK040(thi)002:1285: de nas yum ni zangs ri mkhar du byon /
NK040(thi)002:1286: brag phug gi sgo brag gis bcad /
NK040(thi)002:1287: ci yang mi mthong ba gcig red /
NK040(thi)002:1288: zla ba gsum red tsa snang ba la bkres pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1290: gnas 'dir mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas yin /
NK040(thi)002:1291: ma'i zhal nas nga'i 'tsho ba sbyor ba'i yon bdag /
NK040(thi)002:1292: gcig btang zer ba cig yid la shar /
NK040(thi)002:1293: lo gsum red tsa sngar gyi rnal 'byor rgyus yod gcig btang ste /
NK040(thi)002:1294: thod smyon bsam 'grub zer nas bos tsa a zer grags /
NK040(thi)002:1295: khyod ltog nas ma shi'am byas tsa /
NK040(thi)002:1296: ting 'dzin zas su za ba la mu ges ltog nas ci la shi /
NK040(thi)002:1297: za ma'i sred pa med do zer /
NK040(thi)002:1298: gtum mo'i me drod bsgom pa la //
NK040(thi)002:1299: gos kyi sred pa med nas thal //
NK040(thi)002:1300: snang ba grogs su 'char ba la //
NK040(thi)002:1301: nyon mongs zil gyis non nas thal //
NK040(thi)002:1302: cir snang grogs su 'char ba la //
NK040(thi)002:1303: grogs kyis gdung sems bral nas thal //
NK040(thi)002:1304: bltas pas sku dang ye shes kyis //
NK040(thi)002:1305: zhing khams ci yang mthong ba la //
NK040(thi)002:1306: zhing khams gzhan gyi sred pa bral nas thal //
NK040(thi)002:1307: nga'i a ma sku khams bzang lags sam //
NK040(thi)002:1309: de nas yar dri rmed ci byas kyang gsung gleng med skad /
