NK040(thi)002:1310: lo bdun red tsa nyi ma shar kha brag la nyi ma srab mda' tsam byung snyam pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1311: mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar mo gcig gis phyag na bdud rtsi zhal bu gang bzung nas /
NK040(thi)002:1312: sgrub pa po 'di gsol la sgrub pa mtha' ru bskyol gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1313: khong gis blang nas gsol te /
NK040(thi)002:1314: khong gis thugs dgongs la 'di ma cig gis thugs sprul gcig e yin /
NK040(thi)002:1315: 'di la bsgrub pa'i drod rtags gcig bshad bsam tsa /
NK040(thi)002:1317: ma cig lab sgron gyi zhal nas /
NK040(thi)002:1318: ngas khyod kyi zhabs tog gyis gsungs pas 'tsho ba drong du 'ong ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1319: nga la sgrub pa'i drod tshad kyi rtags ma bshad chos nyid gter du sbos /
NK040(thi)002:1320: nga ni mi ma yin yin /
NK040(thi)002:1321: khyod kyang da rung khong khrig snang bas /
NK040(thi)002:1325: du ma ro gcig tu bsres cig gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1326: de nas lo gsum lon tsa brag phug gi sgo de har gyis bye nas thal tsa /
NK040(thi)002:1327: a ma lab kyi sgron ma seng+ge dkar mo la bcibs nas byon te /
NK040(thi)002:1328: khong yar bzhengs tsa bla dang sgyid pa 'byar nas
NK040(thi)002:1329: bar du khag khag zer nas 'gyel nas snang ngo
NK040(thi)002:1330: // de nas langs te bsgrubs pa'i drod tshad dang rtogs pa ma la phul /
NK040(thi)002:1332: snod ldan du gzigs nas ma'i thugs ka gong yod pa'i gdams pa gnang nas /
NK040(thi)002:1333: zangs ri mkhar dmar nas sha thud khal rgyab mang
NK040(thi)002:1334: po bkal nas tshogs 'khor chen po bskor nas rgyud
NK040(thi)002:1335: rin chen spung pa'i dbang brgya rtsa brgyad mdzad nas
NK040(thi)002:1336: / ma rgyud tshe'i dbang brgya rtsa brgyad mdzad /
NK040(thi)002:1337: brgyud pa 'dzin pa'i dbang bskur lugs rnams gang pa rmug sangs la dbang brgya rtsa brgyad mdzad nas /
NK040(thi)002:1338: thod smyon bsam 'grub gyi bsgom rog la bzhugs tsa /
NK040(thi)002:1339: sham po gangs la chos brgyud 'dzin pa rin po
NK040(thi)002:1340: che'i brgyud pa mu tig tsar las brgyus pa bzhin
NK040(thi)002:1341: du 'ong gsungs / ming yang gangs pa rmug sang du btag /
NK040(thi)002:1342: ma cig kyang lo dgu bcu go dgu lon /
NK040(thi)002:1344: nga yang lo dgu bcu go dgu lon tsa nub phyogs u rgyan yul du 'gro dgos /
NK040(thi)002:1345: 'dir yang 'gro don rdzogs pas srin po'i grong khyer kha mi brgyud gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1346: gling bzhi'i le'u ste rdzogs so ////
NK040(thi)002:1347: de nas ma cig lo dgu bcu go dgu lon pa'i dus su sras rgyal ba don 'grub /
NK040(thi)002:1348: thod smyon bsam 'grub la sogs dbus gtsang ru bzhi'i grwa slob thams cad bsdus nas /
NK040(thi)002:1352: 'brug lo'i dgun zla tha chung gi bco lnga'i nub
NK040(thi)002:1353: mo zangs ri mkhar dmar gyi thog tu yar byon
NK040(thi)002:1354: nas tho ras skya ring shar nas sku gshegs chis
NK040(thi)002:1355: byed pa'i dus sras gnyis la lag pa zed gsungs
NK040(thi)002:1356: nas / zhal mchil re gnang nas /
NK040(thi)002:1357: rgyal ba don 'grub kyi phyag tu dung g.yas su 'khyil ba gcig byon /
NK040(thi)002:1358: thod smyon bsam 'grub kyi phyag tu tshim gsum byon pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1359: gcig la thub pa'i sku byon /
NK040(thi)002:1360: bka' brgyud kyi dbang dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)002:1361: gcig la rje btsun sgrol ma'i sku gcig byon /
NK040(thi)002:1362: ma brgyud kyi dbang dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)002:1363: gcig la dung g.yas su 'khyil ba gcig byon /
NK040(thi)002:1364: 'gro ba'i don yun ring du gnas par gyur cig gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1365: de nas ma gcig seng+ge la bcib ste /
NK040(thi)002:1366: 'khor mkha' 'gro ma dpag med kyis bskor nas lus lhag med du gshegs so //
NK040(thi)002:1367: nub phyogs o rgyan gyi gnas su byon /
NK040(thi)002:1368: de nas thod smyon bsam 'grub ni sham po gangs la myur bar gshegs so //
NK040(thi)002:1370: zangs ri mkhar dmar 'tshogs pa'i grwa bskor rnams kyis /
NK040(thi)002:1371: ma'i na bza' 'ga' zhig de me mchod byas /
NK040(thi)002:1372: dge 'dun pa 'ga' zhig gis nang rten bzhengs /
NK040(thi)002:1373: 'ga' zhig gis kun rigs rgyas par byas /
NK040(thi)002:1374: thams cad kyis mchod pa rgya chen po bsham nas /
NK040(thi)002:1375: ma la ngo mtshar gyis gsol ba 'debs shing bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:1376: de nas rgyal ba don 'grub glang lung du gshegs so //
NK040(thi)002:1377: spyir ma cig la sras mang du yod kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1378: brgyud 'dzin gyis sras bcu drug tu grags ste /
NK040(thi)002:1381: rang dang mnyam pa brgyad de /
NK040(thi)002:1385: brgyud 'dzin gyi sras stong sde ngag gi dbang phyug /
NK040(thi)002:1386: thugs 'dzin gyis sras grol sde rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
NK040(thi)002:1387: skal ldan gyi sras khu sgom chos seng dang bzhi'o //
NK040(thi)002:1390: gang bar lce grong gi zhang lcam dpal rgyan /
NK040(thi)002:1392: 'phan yul gyi nyang mo bsod rgyan dang bzhi yin /
NK040(thi)002:1393: rang mnyam gyi slob ma rgyan bzhi bya bar grags so //
NK040(thi)002:1394: de tsho'i lo rgyus ni gcod gter ma'i dbus na bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)002:1395: rang dang mnyam pa'i sras brgyad la /
NK040(thi)002:1396: mkhyen pa rang dang 'dra ba dag po srong kha'i skye med dga' yan dang gcig /
NK040(thi)002:1397: rtogs pa rang dang mnyam pa la stod lha drug gi pho smyon seng+ge dang gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:1398: byin rlabs rang dang mnyam pa byang mi ti'i smyon pa rang sang dang gsum /
NK040(thi)002:1399: brtul zhugs rang mang mnyam pa bsam yas kyis do pa zang thal dang bzhi /
NK040(thi)002:1400: nus pa rang dang mnyam pa lho brag gtum shul gyi zhig po hur thon /
NK040(thi)002:1401: thugs rje rang dang mnyam pa phan yul gyi skal ldan seng+ge /
NK040(thi)002:1402: tsi ston dar ma yang zer /
NK040(thi)002:1403: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul rang dang mnyam pa mal gro'i rgya sgom hag thon /
NK040(thi)002:1404: 'gro don rang dang mnyam pa rkang po'i rje btsun zil gnon dang brgyad 'byung ngo //
NK040(thi)002:1405: sras rgyal ba don 'grub nas brgyud pa tsho dbus na dar cha che /
NK040(thi)002:1406: stong sde tsho lho brag ngos nas dar cha che /
NK040(thi)002:1407: khu sgom gyis tsho gtsang na dar cha che /
NK040(thi)002:1408: rang dang mnyam pa'i sras brgyad nas brgyud pa tsho
NK040(thi)002:1409: nyang po rong la sogs pa phyogs thams cad na
NK040(thi)002:1411: sras mo rgyan bzhi la sogs pa'i tsho la byin
NK040(thi)002:1412: rlabs kyi bka' babs pas ma brgyud gter ma'i skor
NK040(thi)002:1415: sras de tsho'i lo rgyus dang brgyud lugs zhib par logs su shes so //
NK040(thi)002:1416: 'dir yi ge mang pos 'jigs pa'i phyir ma bris so //
NK040(thi)002:1417: sras de rnams kyi nang nas khyad par du thugs kyi sras khu sgom chos seng dang /
NK040(thi)002:1418: nub lo nyil chung ma yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1419: de la yang thugs zin pa ni khu sgom yin skad /
NK040(thi)002:1420: khu sgom gyis ma cig gis gzim g.yog 'ga' zhig mdzad pas /
NK040(thi)002:1421: ma cig shin tu mnyes pa yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1422: phyis sku gshegs khar khu sgom gyis ma cig la zhus pa /
NK040(thi)002:1423: ma cig khyed kyis sngar gsungs pa'i chos 'di rnams
NK040(thi)002:1424: ma cig nyid kyis thugs brgyud la 'khrungs pa'i man
NK040(thi)002:1426: sangs rgyas nas brgyud pa'i chos gcig yod thang ba gcig /
NK040(thi)002:1427: nyid kyis gang la gsang zhu lags zhus pas /
NK040(thi)002:1428: ma cig gis zhal nas khyed de bden /
NK040(thi)002:1429: nga la sangs rgyas nas bka' brgyud pa'i dgongs pa yod /
NK040(thi)002:1430: sangs rgyas nas da lta'i bar du brgyud pa zam ma chad pa /
NK040(thi)002:1431: gdam ngag gi bcud ma nyams pa /
NK040(thi)002:1432: byin rlabs kyi drod ma yal ba /
NK040(thi)002:1433: bka' brgyud don gyi gdam pa 'di dbang po rab
NK040(thi)002:1434: 'bring tha ma gsum gyi gcod gsum nang drod tshad
NK040(thi)002:1435: dang ldan pas cho 'phrul rang zhir gtong ba'i las
NK040(thi)002:1436: tshogs phrin las dang bcas pa yod de /
NK040(thi)002:1437: de snga sus zhu zer mi yang ma byung /
NK040(thi)002:1438: gdam pa zab pa dang phar la yang su la rang dad kyis ma bstan pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:1439: da khyod la bstan par bya gsungs nas gnang ba'o //
NK040(thi)002:1440: khu sgom gyis ma cig grong nas sras thod pa don 'grub la smras pa /
NK040(thi)002:1441: ma gcig la gdams ngag 'di lta bu gcig 'dug
NK040(thi)002:1442: pa ngas zhus nas yod pa slob dpon la zhabs
NK040(thi)002:1445: ma la gdams ngag yod na bu la ster mchis /
NK040(thi)002:1446: nga la ma bstan pa'i gdam ngag khyed la med de mchis gsungs nas /
NK040(thi)002:1448: sras la bka' brgyud don gyi gdam pa med pa'i rgyu mtshan de lags /
NK040(thi)002:1449: khu sgom la dol pa zangs thal gyis zhus /
NK040(thi)002:1450: dol pa zang thal des dang po gtsang na mtshan nyid kyi chos bslab nas 'dug pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1451: che 'don dkar yol ba'i yul mi rnams kyis snyad
NK040(thi)002:1452: tshol bas bsdad dbang ma ster bas skyo ba skyes
NK040(thi)002:1453: ste / yar gtsang na byon pas de'i lam du bud med gcig gis zho skyogs gang drangs /
NK040(thi)002:1454: mar grogs gcig phul nas gdams ngag gcig zhu zer ba la /
NK040(thi)002:1455: khong gis mtshan nyid kyi chos shes kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1456: gdams ngag tshig gsum bstan ma shes pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1457: kye ma mtshan nyid kyi chos kyi kyang cung zhig
NK040(thi)002:1458: mi phan par 'dug snyam nas skyo ba skyes ste
NK040(thi)002:1459: / yul dbus nas mar byon nas /
NK040(thi)002:1460: bla ma khu sgom chos seng dang mjal nas gdam ngag 'di zhus nas nyams len byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:1461: las tshogs kyi nus pa yang ston /
NK040(thi)002:1462: yul gyi dgra la mthu ser ba gnyis ka byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:1463: dgra thams cad dbang du 'dus pa byung gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1464: des rgya nag gcer bu la gnang ba yin ste /
NK040(thi)002:1465: de nas dol pa zangs thal gyi sngon mthu ser tsho byas pas shin tu 'gyod pa skyes te /
NK040(thi)002:1466: jo mo gcig yod pa dang gnyis /
NK040(thi)002:1467: rgya nag gcer bu la sdug bsngal zhi byed kyi chos zhu ru phyin pas /
NK040(thi)002:1468: kul phying rang la slob dpon bzhugs nas tshogs mdzad pa'i sar mjal nas /
NK040(thi)002:1469: sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa'i chos zhus pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1470: khong gis cog chung gcig kyang byas nas chos nyan zhing bshad cing 'dug pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1471: chos thun gyi gsham du gcod kha 'thor nyams kyi man ngag bag re tsam bshad cing 'dug /
NK040(thi)002:1472: khyod kyi gcod kha 'thor 'di su la zhus dris tsa /
NK040(thi)002:1473: slob dpon thod pa grub se la zhus gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1474: 'o na bka' brgyud don gyi gdam pa zhes bya
NK040(thi)002:1475: ba sangs rgyas nas da lta'i bar du brgyud pa
NK040(thi)002:1477: nang drod tshad dang ldan pas cho 'phrul rang zhir 'gro ba yod pa'i gdam pa mkhyen lags sam /
NK040(thi)002:1479: der bla'o byas pas khyod kyi kyang shes sam gsungs pas /
NK040(thi)002:1480: shes lags bka' brgyud don gyi gdam pa bya ba
NK040(thi)002:1481: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas da lta'i bar brgyud
NK040(thi)002:1483: gegs sel drod tshad zhal shes kyi bya ba gnyis dang bcas pa /
NK040(thi)002:1484: nang man ngag gis gdams pa zab mo'i gnad kyi
NK040(thi)002:1485: cho 'phrul rang zhir 'gro ba'i man ngag 'di 'dra
NK040(thi)002:1487: slob dpon dad pa skyes te /
NK040(thi)002:1489: chos phar bslab tshur bslab mdzad nas /
NK040(thi)002:1490: dol pa zangs thal gyi rgya nag gcer bu la gcod skor bshad pas /
NK040(thi)002:1491: phyis rgya nag gcod mkhan chen por grags nas gcod kyi slob ma mang po byung skad /
NK040(thi)002:1492: des bla ma sangs rgyas rab ston la gnang ste /
NK040(thi)002:1493: mkhyen pa mtho zhing yon tan du ma dang ldan nas grub thob chen por gyur /
NK040(thi)002:1494: lo yang brgya dang mang po lon skad /
NK040(thi)002:1495: des zal mo pa dad pa'i shes rab la gnang ste /
NK040(thi)002:1496: de yang dang po ar+ya de ba'i gzhung chung gzigs pas /
NK040(thi)002:1497: dad pa skyes nas 'di sus shes dris pas /
NK040(thi)002:1498: bla ma sangs rgyas rab ston gyis mkhyen zer bas drung du phyin nas zhus pas gnang ste /
NK040(thi)002:1499: khong thugs rje shes rab shin tu che ba yon tan phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba /
NK040(thi)002:1500: 'phags skor yo ga dus 'khor kyee rdor la sogs pa'i sngags rnams mkhyen /
NK040(thi)002:1501: byang chub kyis sems 'byongs pas chos brgyad med par
NK040(thi)002:1502: 'gro don mdzad pa'i grub thob chen po yin no
NK040(thi)002:1503: // des gdams ngag gcig brgyud rnams bla ma sum pa ras pa la gnang nas /
NK040(thi)002:1504: gnyan khrod 'grims pas mdze nad thon pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1505: skye med kyi don khong du chud nas sems can mang po la smin grol mdzad do //
NK040(thi)002:1509: des kahthoga pa shes rab bla ma /
NK040(thi)002:1511: des rtogs ldan nam mkha' rdo rje /
NK040(thi)002:1512: des bla ma yang khrod pa /
NK040(thi)002:1513: des mkhas btsun ye shes rgyan pa /
NK040(thi)002:1515: de lta bu'i brgyud pa ngo mtshar lo rgyus kyi
NK040(thi)002:1516: rims pa'i don dang ldan nam mi ldan gyis slob
NK040(thi)002:1518: slob dpon des chos gsungs pa'i gnad du rung mi
NK040(thi)002:1519: rung gi slob ma brtags pa rnams ni gzhan du
NK040(thi)002:1520: shes so // gong du bshad pa de rnams ni
NK040(thi)002:1521: ma gcig gis rnam thar rgyas pa gling bzhi ma
NK040(thi)002:1522: shes so // / rnam thar bsdus pa zab don thugs snying gi lo rgyus /
NK040(thi)002:1523: bka' brgyud don gyi lo rgyus bsdus pa /
NK040(thi)002:1524: de rnams kyi nang nas btus so //
NK040(thi)002:1525: des yid ches shing khung btsun par bya ba'i phyir
NK040(thi)002:1526: du brgyud pa'i lo rgyus kyi rim pa zung bzhi
NK040(thi)002:1527: ya brgyad kyis khog phub pa de song ngo //
NK040(thi)002:1528: spyi don gnyis pa mtshon pa dpe drug gi gcod kyi che ba bskyed pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1529: ma'i zhal nas spyir gcod kyi chos 'di g.yu'i dum bu dang 'dra /
NK040(thi)002:1530: gser gyi phye ma dang 'dra bas gzhung du long ba med cing /
NK040(thi)002:1531: cha lag tshang ba med kyang man ngag sna res kyang phan thog pa yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1532: gangs ri dang 'dra ste kha ba bab kyang dkar /
NK040(thi)002:1534: de bzhin du chos gzhan gyi rten yod kyang chog /
NK040(thi)002:1536: seng+ge dang 'dra ste seng+ge la khyu che yang chog /
NK040(thi)002:1537: gcig gis kyang kher rkyang pher ste /
NK040(thi)002:1538: de bzhin du gcod mkhan la chos gzhan shes kyang legs /
NK040(thi)002:1539: gcod rkyang pa las mi shes kyang 'gro don byar btub /
NK040(thi)002:1540: rnga bo che'i sgra dang 'dra ste /
NK040(thi)002:1541: brdung ba'i dus su dung dang cha lang la sogs pa'i sgra ji snyed gcig yod kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1542: rnga bo che'i skad kyi zhor 'degs min pa rang
NK040(thi)002:1543: rang gi skad kyi ngo bo ma thon pa bzhin
NK040(thi)002:1544: du chos ji snyed gcig shes kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1545: gcod kyi zhor 'degs las mi 'ong ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1546: dngos grub kyi chu mig dang 'dra ste /
NK040(thi)002:1548: nyung yang 'tsho dpe de bzhin du grwa pa dang bu slob dang mi mang yang sangs rgyas /
NK040(thi)002:1549: nyung yang sangs rgyas pa yin no //
NK040(thi)002:1550: rta bzang po'i spu mdog dang 'dra ba yin te /
NK040(thi)002:1553: dpe de bzhin du gcod nyams su len pa'i gang zag la /
NK040(thi)002:1554: chos gang dang yang bstun du gtub pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:1555: 'on kyang spu ris su phye na phyi pha rol
NK040(thi)002:1556: tu phyin pa mthun pa yin pas rgyas 'bring bsdus
NK040(thi)002:1558: bsdus pa res tsam la bshad pa gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1559: nang gsang sngags dang mthun pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:1560: rgyud sde chen po ma shes kyang rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs bskor re tsam skyong dang gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1563: lar gcod 'di bka' pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:1564: gsang sngags rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang yang mthun cha che /
NK040(thi)002:1565: chos gang dang bstun kyang mi mthun pa med /
NK040(thi)002:1566: khyad par ma rgyud dang mthun no //
NK040(thi)002:1567: 'di yang zab don thugs snying gi lo rgyus nas btus so //
NK040(thi)002:1568: des gnyis pa mtshon pa dpe drug gi che ba bskyed pa song ngo //
NK040(thi)002:1569: spyi don gsum pa phyi nang gsang gsum gyi sgo nas gcod kyi chos ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1570: dang po phyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa ltar ngos bzung na /
NK040(thi)002:1571: gcod 'di bka' bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dgongs don yin /
NK040(thi)002:1574: pha rol tu yin pa drug ldan gyi dgongs pa /
NK040(thi)002:1575: stong nyid snying rje snying po can /
NK040(thi)002:1576: mtha' bral dbu ma'i dgongs don ston nas yod pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1577: las mkhan yum chen mos byed pa'i phyir ro //
NK040(thi)002:1578: gnyis pa gsang sngags ltar ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1580: mtshan nyid gsang sngags lha'i phye //
NK040(thi)002:1582: mtshan nyid kyi lugs la yi dam lha'i sgrub thabs med kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1583: gsang sngags kyi lugs la rje btsun ma'i bsgrub thabs yod pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1584: sgo 'byed bcu yi sgrub thabs byin rlabs sgo 'byed kyi nang du ston pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1585: las mkhan rje btsun mas byed pa'i phyir ro //
NK040(thi)002:1586: phar phyin gyi lugs la dbang bskur med kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1587: gcod 'di la ma cig gis gcod dbang rin chen spungs pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1589: dbang bskur chos kyi sgo 'byed rnams gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK040(thi)002:1590: phar phyin gyi lugs la sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rten pa'i bshad pa med kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1594: mdze gos btsog mo la sogs sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga brten pa yin te /
NK040(thi)002:1596: bdud rtsi dri chen dri chu dang /
NK040(thi)002:1597: mi sha khyi sha la sogs pa /
NK040(thi)002:1598: gtsang rtsog med par nyams su blangs //
NK040(thi)002:1600: gsum pa gsang ba bla med kyi dgongs don ltar ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1601: pha rol du phyin pa'i lugs la /
NK040(thi)002:1602: kun rdzob don dam spang gnyen res mos su 'dod kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1603: gcod 'di'i lugs la gang shar gyi ngo bo la
NK040(thi)002:1604: spang blang dang dgag sgrub kyi rtsol ba med par
NK040(thi)002:1605: 'dod de / ma cig gis zhal nas /
NK040(thi)002:1606: sems skye ba med pa'i man+dala la //
NK040(thi)002:1607: don snang ba sna tshogs kyi tshom bu bkod //
NK040(thi)002:1608: snang stong 'dzin med kyi chag chag gdab //
NK040(thi)002:1609: ro mnyam bde chen gyi ngang du 'bul //
NK040(thi)002:1610: zung 'jug rtogs par byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)002:1612: phyi nang gsang gsum 'di'i lugs ni /
NK040(thi)002:1614: 'dir ni gdul bya'i khyad par las //
NK040(thi)002:1615: 'dul byed phyi nang mdo sngags gnyis //
NK040(thi)002:1616: sngags ltar chos sgo dbang gi dbye //
NK040(thi)002:1617: de ni thabs kyi khyad par yin //
NK040(thi)002:1618: mdo ltar lta sgom gtan la dbab //
NK040(thi)002:1619: spyod pa sngags kyi srang la gzhugs //
NK040(thi)002:1622: gang phyir ma 'ongs bskal pa'i mthar //
NK040(thi)002:1623: grub mtha' phyogs ris 'then byed cing //
NK040(thi)002:1624: chos spang la sogs 'byung ba'i phyir //
NK040(thi)002:1625: mdo sngags mtha' bral gcod kyis don //
NK040(thi)002:1629: lta ba ni dbu ma mtha' bral gyi lta ba /
NK040(thi)002:1630: sgom pa ni lam phyag rgya chen po nyams su len pa /
NK040(thi)002:1631: spyod pa ni snang zhen gyi 'khri ba btsan thabs
NK040(thi)002:1632: su gcod cing spang gnyen ro mnyam ngo bo gcig
NK040(thi)002:1633: tu spyod pa / 'bras bu ni sku lnga yongs rdzogs thob par byed do //
NK040(thi)002:1635: des gsum pa phyi nang gsang gsum gyi sgo nas gcod kyi chos ngos bzung ba song //
NK040(thi)002:1636: spyi don bzhi pa blo ldog rnam pa bzhi'i sgo
NK040(thi)002:1637: nas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su sbyongs
NK040(thi)002:1638: ba'i thabs ni gzhan du shes so //
NK040(thi)002:1639: spyi don lnga pa dngos grub rnam pa gnyis 'byung bar byed pa'i thabs la /
NK040(thi)002:1640: gcod kyi gdam pa lag len du bstan pa dngos la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)002:1641: rdo rje'i tshig rkang gis gzhung srang ba /
NK040(thi)002:1642: sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su len pa'o //
NK040(thi)002:1644: ma cig lab kyi sgron mas /
NK040(thi)002:1645: tshad med kyi snying rje brgyud la sbyangs //
NK040(thi)002:1646: gtad med kyi rig pa dbyings dang bsre //
NK040(thi)002:1647: bdag med kyi lus po gzan du bskyur //
NK040(thi)002:1648: spros med kyis ngang du lhang nger bzhag /
NK040(thi)002:1650: 'og gi gzhung gi skabs su rims par gsal lo //
NK040(thi)002:1651: gnyis pa sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis nyams su len pa la gsum ste /
NK040(thi)002:1658: dang po lam gyi byed las la /
NK040(thi)002:1659: khyim nas gnyan khrod du ma pheb kyi bar la don bzhi ste /
NK040(thi)002:1660: dang po gces pa rnam pa gsum ni /
NK040(thi)002:1661: 'gro ba'i gnyan sa gsang ba gces //
NK040(thi)002:1662: nyil chung 'phar ma'i dmigs pa gces //
NK040(thi)002:1663: lam gyi lha 'dre dbang bsdud gces //
NK040(thi)002:1665: dang po gar 'gro gsang zhing zil gnon 'phen pa /
NK040(thi)002:1666: gnyis pa khyim nas sgor ma phebs kyi bar du sems bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)002:1667: gsum pa sgor phebs nas gnyan mgo ma mthong gi bar du gnas tshul bzhi'i dmigs pa byed pa /
NK040(thi)002:1668: bzhi pa gnyan mgo mthong nas gnyan khrod du ma
NK040(thi)002:1669: phebs kyi bar la dmar mo dbang bsdud byed pa'o
NK040(thi)002:1671: gang la gang 'dul yi dmigs pa nang snga mo nas 'phen dgos la /
NK040(thi)002:1672: nag mos zil gyis gnon cing dmar mos dbang du bsdud /
NK040(thi)002:1677: phata byas pa tsam gyis rang nyid ma cig lab
NK040(thi)002:1678: kyi sgron ma sku mdog zil gnon gyi skabs su
NK040(thi)002:1679: khros ma nag mo yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1680: mthing nag gcig tu bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas /
NK040(thi)002:1681: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1682: gnam lcags las grub pa'i khro chu'i pha wong blos khyab tshad gcig tu sprul nas 'phang ste /
NK040(thi)002:1683: ri dang sgong gang yin pa'i gnyan sa la phog
NK040(thi)002:1684: nas tsam gzhong gsig zin pa 'dra ba byas pas
NK040(thi)002:1685: / phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1686: khro chu'i pha bong yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)002:1688: phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus dang dgur 'dug cing /
NK040(thi)002:1689: der gnas pa'i lha 'dre so pa dang bcas pa
NK040(thi)002:1690: thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang med par sgom pa
NK040(thi)002:1691: 'dres so // yang mtsho dang chu mig gang yin pa la phog ste /
NK040(thi)002:1692: khrob khrob khol nas phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis
NK040(thi)002:1693: me'i bya khyung grangs med kyi gur khang gcig tu
NK040(thi)002:1695: der gnas pa'i lha 'dre so pa dang bcas pa
NK040(thi)002:1696: thams cad tshud nas gar yang 'gro dbang med par
NK040(thi)002:1697: bsam / yang lha khang mchod rten /
NK040(thi)002:1706: brag mdo la sogs pa'i gnyan sa la /
NK040(thi)002:1707: gong bzhin ma cig sku mdog mthing nag tu bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas /
NK040(thi)002:1708: phata gcig brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1709: rdo rje rtse dgu pa gcig sprul nas 'phangs te /
NK040(thi)002:1710: gnyen sa gang yin pa de la phog pa nas /
NK040(thi)002:1711: tsam gzhong gsig pa 'dra ba gcig byas ste /
NK040(thi)002:1712: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis rdo rje yongs su
NK040(thi)002:1713: gyur pa las ma cig lab sgron zil gnon gyi
NK040(thi)002:1714: skabs su khros ma nag mo yin no //
NK040(thi)002:1716: sku mdog mthing nag dgur gyur te /
NK040(thi)002:1717: phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus su dang dgur bzhugs nas /
NK040(thi)002:1718: de la gnas pa'i lha 'dre thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:1719: shing gcig kher skyes yin na /
NK040(thi)002:1720: ma gcig lab sgron gong bzhin bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas /
NK040(thi)002:1721: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1722: gnam lcags kyi s+t+wa re ngar ma gcig sprul nas 'phangs te /
NK040(thi)002:1723: shing de la phog pas rdul phran bzhin du btang pas /
NK040(thi)002:1724: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyi gnam lcags kyis s+t+wa re yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)002:1725: ma cig lab sgron sku mdog mthing nag gcig tu gyur nas /
NK040(thi)002:1726: gong bzhin gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:1727: yang shing nags 'thug po yin na ma cig lab
NK040(thi)002:1728: sgron sku mdog mthing nag gong bzhin bskyed pa'i thugs
NK040(thi)002:1729: ka nas / phata gcig brjod pa tsam gyis gnam
NK040(thi)002:1730: lcags kyi ral gri rno ba'i ngar dang ldan pa
NK040(thi)002:1732: shing nags de rdul phran bzhin gong ltar btang nas /
NK040(thi)002:1733: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis ral gri yongs su
NK040(thi)002:1734: gyur pa las ma cig lab sgron gong bzhin du
NK040(thi)002:1735: gyur nas / gar yang 'gro dbang med par sgom /
NK040(thi)002:1737: sa rgyus med pa'i sa na zil gnon 'phangs pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1739: rang nyid khros nag mo'i thugs ka nas phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1740: gnam lcags kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa 'phros pas
NK040(thi)002:1741: sa phyogs der phog pa tsam gyi tsam gzhong bsreg
NK040(thi)002:1742: pa ltar byas nas phata cig byas pa tsam gyis
NK040(thi)002:1743: rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)002:1744: dpa' bo dma' mo'i gur khang /
NK040(thi)002:1745: de'i rgyab tu rdo rje'i d+r+wa gur /
NK040(thi)002:1746: de'i rgyab tu mi nag gi lag sbrel gyi de'i rgyab mun nag gi gur khang bsgom nas /
NK040(thi)002:1747: der gnas pa'i lha 'dre thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:1748: de nas gnyan mgo mthong ba dang /
NK040(thi)002:1749: snga mo'i zil gnon gang dgos 'phangs shing /
NK040(thi)002:1751: yang na gong gis zil gnon de rnams gang yang mi byed par /
NK040(thi)002:1752: ri brag la sogs gnyan sa kun la zil gnon 'dis chog par gsungs te /
NK040(thi)002:1753: rang nyid khros ma nag mo'i thugs ka nas gnam
NK040(thi)002:1754: lcags kyis rdo rje 'phros pa las gnyan sa gang
NK040(thi)002:1755: yin pa thams cad gzhig nas /
NK040(thi)002:1756: khros ma nag mo dgur sgom pa la sogs gong bzhin bya'o //
NK040(thi)002:1758: snga them snga ru mi non na //
NK040(thi)002:1759: dgra ngan dag la bya shor 'dra //
NK040(thi)002:1760: de la zil gnon gnad bdun dgos //
NK040(thi)002:1763: gnyis pa khyim nas sgor ma phebs kyi bar du /
NK040(thi)002:1765: zhal gdam bco brgyad ma las /
NK040(thi)002:1766: phata gcig brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1767: rang gi spyi bor pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la /
NK040(thi)002:1768: bla ma yi dam chos skyong kun 'dus gyi ngo
NK040(thi)002:1769: bo mtshungs med dpal ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma dang
NK040(thi)002:1770: gnyis su med pa'i ma cig lab kyi sgron ma
NK040(thi)002:1771: sku dmog dkar mo bzhugs par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:1772: lus gdon gnas gdon gnyis kyis gtso byas nam mkha'
NK040(thi)002:1773: dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
NK040(thi)002:1775: de'i ched du gnyan sa ri khrod du 'gro snyam du sems bskyed la /
NK040(thi)002:1776: lus longs spyod kha rje dbang thang yo byad dang bcas pa 'bul bar sgom zhing /
NK040(thi)002:1778: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du /
NK040(thi)002:1779: bdag 'dzin blo yis thongs par byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)002:1780: dgos med rgyud la skye bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)002:1781: rang sems skye med gcig char du rtogs pa mdzad du gsol //
NK040(thi)002:1782: ces de ltar sgor ma pheb kyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
NK040(thi)002:1783: des gnyis pa sems bskyed pa song nas /
NK040(thi)002:1784: gsum pa sgor pheb nas 'og la yod pa'i thog srung 'di nas bya gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1786: gnyan mgo ma mthong gi bar du /
NK040(thi)002:1787: dkar sbyor las gnas tshul bzhi'i dmigs pa byed pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1788: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1789: lus ni ro yi tshul du 'gro //
NK040(thi)002:1790: rig pa ro khur tshul du dmigs //
NK040(thi)002:1791: gnyan sa dur khrod du bsam //
NK040(thi)002:1792: lha 'dre gcan spyang tshul du dmigs //
NK040(thi)002:1793: ces de ltar gnyan sa mgo ma mthong gis bar du /
NK040(thi)002:1794: logs su ma yengs par 'gro ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1795: de gsum pa gnas tshul bzhi'i dmigs pa song nas /
NK040(thi)002:1796: bzhi pa gnyan mgo mthong nas /
NK040(thi)002:1797: gnyan khrod du ma pheb kyi bar du /
NK040(thi)002:1798: dmar mos dbang bsdud byed pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1799: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1800: rang nyid rje btsun ma sku mdog dmar mo mi rkang gi gling bu tshag tshag 'bud pas /
NK040(thi)002:1801: tshad med dpal 'byor mdzod chen las /
NK040(thi)002:1802: lha 'dre thams cad 'dar chom chom byed par sgom la /
NK040(thi)002:1803: phata grangs med brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1804: lam la gnas pa'i lha 'dre thams cad rang dbang med par 'ub 'ub 'dus nas /
NK040(thi)002:1805: rang nyid la spung gis bskor nas /
NK040(thi)002:1806: gnyan sar ma sleb gyi bar du logs su ma yengs par phata brjod cing 'gro ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1807: gnyan khrod du phyin pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1808: sngon du zil gnon 'phang zin las gyur pa'i ma
NK040(thi)002:1809: cig lab sgron mthing nag la sogs dbus kyi gang
NK040(thi)002:1811: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis rang la thim par bsgom pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1812: phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad kyi lab sgron mthing nag la sogs gang dang gang yin pa rnams /
NK040(thi)002:1813: mal du yod pa dang bcas pa des lam nas
NK040(thi)002:1814: bkug pa'i lha 'dre thams cad gnyan sa de bas
NK040(thi)002:1815: gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgom la /
NK040(thi)002:1816: rang gi rkang dung 'bud la phata drag po brjod pa gal che ba yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:1817: des bzhi pa lam gyi dbang bsdud rdzogs pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:1818: spyi don gnyis pa gnas kyi byed las ni /
NK040(thi)002:1819: pheb nas snga ba rnams bzhi ni /
NK040(thi)002:1820: gnyan sa'i dmigs du phebs pa snga //
NK040(thi)002:1821: mal bca' dbang bsdud zil non snga //
NK040(thi)002:1822: snying rje'i kun slong dmigs pa snga //
NK040(thi)002:1823: gnyan dmigs thab kha bca' ba snga //
NK040(thi)002:1825: gnyer sar phebs nas thab ka btsug shing 'tsho ba ma rdzogs kyi bar du don lnga ste /
NK040(thi)002:1826: dang po gnyan dmigs btsal ba /
NK040(thi)002:1827: gnyis pa khra ther phub pa /
NK040(thi)002:1828: gsum pa dbang bsdud zil gnon /
NK040(thi)002:1829: bzhi pa dam tshig bsre ba /
NK040(thi)002:1830: lnga pa thabs kha btsug pa'o //
NK040(thi)002:1831: dang po gnyan dmigs btsal ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:1832: dper na me btsa' an tshugs su bsreg na nad la phan pa ltar /
NK040(thi)002:1833: 'dir yang gnas kyi mtshan nyid la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)002:1834: rig pas btsal zhing rgyas pa dang /
NK040(thi)002:1835: brtul shugs spyod cing gnas mig btsal ba'o //
NK040(thi)002:1836: dang po rig pa dpyad pa la gsum ste /
NK040(thi)002:1840: de la dang po rdzas ni /
NK040(thi)002:1841: rin chen 'dra ba'i steng na bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:1842: gdug dang rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i tog /
NK040(thi)002:1843: dung dang bum pa 'dra ba'i lto ba /
NK040(thi)002:1845: dpal be'u 'dra ba'i dkyil du bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:1846: mchod rten gyen lta'i bum pa /
NK040(thi)002:1849: lung gsum dang sgang gsum gyis 'dus mdo /
NK040(thi)002:1855: chu mig mgo gcig pa'i mgo yin te /
NK040(thi)002:1857: mgo gsum mgo lnga man chad kyi 'dus mdo /
NK040(thi)002:1858: mgo dgu la sogs grangs mang gi dkyil /
NK040(thi)002:1860: kun nas spung 'dra dag gi dkyil /
NK040(thi)002:1861: khri brtseg rgyab yol bres 'dra dang /
NK040(thi)002:1862: grong dang pho brang brtseg pa 'dra ba'i steng /
NK040(thi)002:1864: gzhan yang dur gling gang yin gyi dkyil gcig pa'i steng /
NK040(thi)002:1865: khyad par rgya mtsho'i zangs kha yod sar bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:1867: phug pa'i nang gre ba dang po bar dag tu bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:1869: mchod rten zhig ral gyi dkyil /
NK040(thi)002:1870: lha khang gi sgo them 'am bskor khang /
NK040(thi)002:1874: gangs ri ri rab kyi rtse /
NK040(thi)002:1875: de nas snying dang lte ba /
NK040(thi)002:1877: chu phyar sna dang rtsa ba /
NK040(thi)002:1878: brag nag dag gi rtsa ba /
NK040(thi)002:1881: dil mgo nu ma 'dra ba'i tog /
NK040(thi)002:1883: sog pa 'dra ba'i tshun rkang steng /
NK040(thi)002:1885: nag med shing gcig gang yin yang /
NK040(thi)002:1886: glang phung rkang gcig rtsa ba ste /
NK040(thi)002:1887: shug pa 'bo lo lcang ma'i ka brag ltag pa dag tu 'dug /
NK040(thi)002:1888: khang ral dag gi mdzod sgo /
NK040(thi)002:1899: dom dang spyang ku 'dra ba'i sder mo /
NK040(thi)002:1901: bya dang mi 'dra ba'i snying kha /
NK040(thi)002:1905: stag 'dra ba'i sder mo'i kha dang sna'i bar /
NK040(thi)002:1907: spal pa gyen rgyu 'dra ba'i snying kha /
NK040(thi)002:1913: g.yag dang sdig pa'i rwa bar /
NK040(thi)002:1918: bya 'dra ba'i kha dang bye ba /
NK040(thi)002:1919: skyil krung bcas 'dra dang gan rkyal dang /
NK040(thi)002:1920: btsun mo'i brang rgyan thog 'dra dang /
NK040(thi)002:1921: rgyal blon gdan la bzhugs 'dra'i snying kha dang lte ba /
NK040(thi)002:1923: pha ri len gyi rgyang bcad kyang /
NK040(thi)002:1924: bya phag sbal sbrul lcang mo la sogs sna la 'dug go //
NK040(thi)002:1925: gsum pa ma nges pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1930: mdor na rang gi yang 'di na gnyan bsam sar bsdad par bya'o //
NK040(thi)002:1931: gnyis pa brtul shugs spyod cing gnas /
NK040(thi)002:1933: thang chen po la sogs la gnyan sa'i dmigs ma rnyed na /
NK040(thi)002:1934: rang nyid khros ma nag mo'i rang bzhin can mi lpags gis g.yang gzhi sku la gsol ba /
NK040(thi)002:1935: zhabs gar thabs su mdzad pa /
NK040(thi)002:1936: phyag na thod rnga dkrol bar bsgom la /
NK040(thi)002:1937: phata brjod cing gnyan sa la bskor ba byed cing /
NK040(thi)002:1941: bag dro ba nyams dga' ba de lta bu byung sar bsdad do //
NK040(thi)002:1942: ces man ngag gser thur las gsungs so //
NK040(thi)002:1943: spyir gnyan sa chen po yin na gcod dpon gang gnyan sar bsdad /
NK040(thi)002:1944: de mchan gnyan sa gcig la nad pa de nas gnyan sa la thabs kha baca'o //
NK040(thi)002:1945: nad pa dang gcod dpon thag nye ba gal che'o //
NK040(thi)002:1946: gnyan sa chung na gar gnyan sar nad pa /
NK040(thi)002:1947: de nas gnyan sa gang dang 'dra /
NK040(thi)002:1948: des gnyan dmigs btsal ba rdzogs nas /
NK040(thi)002:1949: gnyis pa khra ther thub pa ni /
NK040(thi)002:1951: gnyan dmigs gang yin pa'i thog tu /
NK040(thi)002:1952: khra ther phub ma thag tu phata bzhi brjod la /
NK040(thi)002:1953: dang po khra ther ma cig lab kyi sgron ma sku mdog dkar mor bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:1954: gnyis pa chon thag rnams 'ja' tshon gyi d+r+wa bar bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:1955: gsum pa phur pa rnams mkha' mgro ma sde bzhir bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:1956: khra ther ma cig dang mkha' 'gro sde lngar red pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:1957: bzhi pa rngog rke rnams rigs lnga'i phyogs btsug dus shar nas g.yas bskor du rim par btsug shing /
NK040(thi)002:1961: kyi mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa bsgom pa yin no //
NK040(thi)002:1962: de ltar byin rlabs thon nas dam tshig la mi 'gom pa gal che ba yin /
NK040(thi)002:1963: khra ther gyi nang du nyal sa bde mo thon ma thag tu /
NK040(thi)002:1964: phata gcig brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1965: zhabs de lcags mkhar nag po gru gsum gting zab pa /
NK040(thi)002:1967: nang na srub med pa gcig red par sgom /
NK040(thi)002:1968: des gnyis pa khra ther phub pa song nas /
NK040(thi)002:1969: gsum pa dbang bsdud zil non byed pa la /
NK040(thi)002:1971: rang nyid khra ther gyis sgor langs te /
NK040(thi)002:1972: stan mchan khung du bcug cing zhal phyir gyu nas /
NK040(thi)002:1973: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:1974: rang nyid rje btsun ma sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK040(thi)002:1975: g.yas na mi lpags kyis g.yang gzhi dbyug tor gzad nas bsnams pa /
NK040(thi)002:1976: g.yon na mi rkang gi gling bu tshag tshag 'bud par sgom la /
NK040(thi)002:1977: rkang dung 'bud cing phata sgra drag tu brjod la 'di skad do //
NK040(thi)002:1978: 'o gtso bo yis gdon chen bco brgyad /
NK040(thi)002:1979: byis pa'i gdon chen bco lnga /
NK040(thi)002:1984: mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chad /
NK040(thi)002:1985: dma' na rag gis dmyal khams yan chad /
NK040(thi)002:1986: mtho nam mkha'i lha phran man chad /
NK040(thi)002:1987: dma' ba sa 'og gi lto 'phye yan chad /
NK040(thi)002:1988: dpe dkar rgyal po man chad /
NK040(thi)002:1990: snang srid pa'i lha 'dre thams cad tshur 'dus /
NK040(thi)002:1991: 'ee khyad par du gnyan khrod 'di na gnas pa'i dkar po lha yi sde tshan /
NK040(thi)002:1992: nag po bdud kyi sde tshan /
NK040(thi)002:1993: dmar po btsan gyi sde tshan /
NK040(thi)002:1994: khra bo gza' yi sde tshan /
NK040(thi)002:1998: pho mo ma ning gi sde tshan du gtogs pa'i lha 'dre thams cad tshur 'dus /
NK040(thi)002:1999: 'ee khyad par du yang ch+gee mo'i nad pa med na mi dgos /
NK040(thi)002:2000: phung po khams dang skye mched la /
NK040(thi)002:2001: dang po nad kyi sna 'dren pa /
NK040(thi)002:2002: bar du nad kyi tshang bca' ba /
NK040(thi)002:2003: tha ma nad la mi phan par byed pa'i pho gdon 'byung po /
NK040(thi)002:2017: khong pa'i srog gcod par byed pa'i bdud dang log par 'dren pa thams cad tshur 'dus /
NK040(thi)002:2018: de ltar khra ther gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga nas 'bod pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:2019: de ltar byas pas snang srid kyi bka'i lha ma
NK040(thi)002:2020: srin sde brgyad rnams rang gi phyi rol ma cig
NK040(thi)002:2021: lab sgron brgyad kyi nang du tshud par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:2022: gnas gdon lus gdon nyis rang gi zhabs lcags mkhar nang du tshud par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:2023: nang nub kyi gtor bsngosa byed dus su /
NK040(thi)002:2024: bsrung 'khor de lcags mkhar gyi kha yan chad la dbugs pa yin /
NK040(thi)002:2025: yang dbang bsdud kyi dmigs pa byas la /
NK040(thi)002:2026: 'ee khyad par du yang gnyan khrod 'di na gnas
NK040(thi)002:2027: pa'i snang zhing srid pa'i lha 'dre thams cad nyon
NK040(thi)002:2028: cig / khyed rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:2029: bdag gis khyed rnams la zab mo chos kyi 'brel pa byed /
NK040(thi)002:2030: dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas /
NK040(thi)002:2031: rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi sa la dgod pa'i phyir 'dir 'ong ba yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:2032: bdag gis phrin las myur du bsgrub cig /
NK040(thi)002:2033: gal te phrin las myur du mi grub na /
NK040(thi)002:2034: yul khams 'dir mdze sha'i thang mal gdal /
NK040(thi)002:2035: mdze khrag gi rgya mtsho bskyil /
NK040(thi)002:2036: mdze rkang gis ka ba btsug /
NK040(thi)002:2038: mdze lpags gis bla re bres nas /
NK040(thi)002:2039: pho brang bca' ba yin te /
NK040(thi)002:2040: 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du lha 'dre khyed
NK040(thi)002:2041: rnams dang 'bral med du gnas 'di bas skad cig
NK040(thi)002:2042: kyang g.yo bar mi byed do //
NK040(thi)002:2044: yid la rgyun du bsam na /
NK040(thi)002:2047: de bas da lta nyid du bdag gi phrin las myur du sgrubs shig /
NK040(thi)002:2049: ces lan gsum brjod pas dmigs med sgom /
NK040(thi)002:2050: gal te gdon bros pa'i rtags rmi lam la sogs byung na /
NK040(thi)002:2053: gdon rnams gzhan du bros pa na //
NK040(thi)002:2054: de la pho nya dngul dkar btang //
NK040(thi)002:2055: ces gsungs phyir na zhi ba ltar //
NK040(thi)002:2056: rang nyid ma cig thugs ka nas //
NK040(thi)002:2058: snang srid bkug la rang 'og bsdu //
NK040(thi)002:2059: lan gsum byas nas lus sbyin bya //
NK040(thi)002:2060: snying rje'i sems ldan stong nyid sgom //
NK040(thi)002:2062: dmar nag lcags kyu'i dmigs pa dgos //
NK040(thi)002:2063: ces gsungs phyir na drag po ltar //
NK040(thi)002:2064: rang nyid khros ma'i thugs ka nas //
NK040(thi)002:2065: 'od zer rdo rje'i tsh+wa tsh+wa can //
NK040(thi)002:2066: lcags kyu nag po'i rnam pa 'phros //
NK040(thi)002:2068: gnas dang bcas pa bkug par bsam //
NK040(thi)002:2070: pha mar dmigs la lus sbyin bya //
NK040(thi)002:2071: gsum las mi mang skye med sgom //
NK040(thi)002:2072: yang na nad pa gal chen yod pa'am //
NK040(thi)002:2073: yang na rang nyid na ba yin na /
NK040(thi)002:2075: 'ee gnyan khrod 'di na gnas pa thams cad gson cig /
NK040(thi)002:2076: khyed rnams kyi ch+gee'i 'di rab mnar med pa'i dmyal
NK040(thi)002:2077: bar bskyur la gtan du thar dus med par gyis
NK040(thi)002:2078: shig / 'bring da lta nyid du zol /
NK040(thi)002:2079: mal du til 'bru ma tsam yang ma lus pa gyis shig /
NK040(thi)002:2080: tha ma yang na mi thub pa /
NK040(thi)002:2082: dbugs phyi nang rgyu mi thub pa /
NK040(thi)002:2083: 'di bas kyang thu ba'i nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi /
NK040(thi)002:2084: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu /
NK040(thi)002:2085: byis pa'i gdon chen bco lnga /
NK040(thi)002:2086: blo bur gnyis khri gcig stong /
NK040(thi)002:2087: ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu thams cad thongs shig /
NK040(thi)002:2088: de ltar ma byed pa na ra kan /
NK040(thi)002:2089: tshar nas gdan bting ba dang sprad la /
NK040(thi)002:2092: lcags mkhar gyi kha de mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhi cig gis bkab par bsgom la /
NK040(thi)002:2094: stan thog du 'dug sa dang sprad la /
NK040(thi)002:2095: phata byas pa tsam gyis rang nyid dpa' bo go rje ba'i tshul gyis /
NK040(thi)002:2096: ma cig lab sgron sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa /
NK040(thi)002:2098: g.yon lcags kyu bsnams pa gcig red par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:2099: ngag tu h'u h'u h'u lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi thugs ka dang /
NK040(thi)002:2101: ba spu'i gseb nas khro chung rang 'dra ba grangs med pa spros pas /
NK040(thi)002:2102: lha 'dre thams cad gar yang 'gro dbang med de /
NK040(thi)002:2103: rang la phyag rgya bca' zhing /
NK040(thi)002:2104: bka' nyan gsung sdod par bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:2105: khro chung rnams kyang snga mo'i lab sgron dang 'chab pa'i gur gcig sgoms /
NK040(thi)002:2106: des gsum pa dbang bsdud zil non song nas /
NK040(thi)002:2107: bzhi pa dam tshig bsre ba ni /
NK040(thi)002:2108: phata gcig byas pa tsam gyis ma cig gis mdun gyi nam mkhar skyabs yul bsgom /
NK040(thi)002:2109: gnyis pas rang nyid tha mal pa red nas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbyings rig bsre ba /
NK040(thi)002:2110: dkar 'gyed yan chad kyi byed las rnams 'og tu zhib pas 'dir lan mdzod /
NK040(thi)002:2111: yang na ma skabs na lha 'dre'i don du skyabs 'gro sems bskyed kho na byas kyang chog gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:2112: des bzhi pa dam tshig bsre ba song nas /
NK040(thi)002:2113: lnga pa thabakha btsug shing ci srid sangs ma rgyas byang ma chub /
NK040(thi)002:2114: byams mgon gyi bstan pa ma dar gyi bar du
NK040(thi)002:2115: lha 'dre khyed rnams dang 'bral med du gnas 'dir
NK040(thi)002:2116: pho brang bca' ba yin brjod /
NK040(thi)002:2117: de nas bza' btung gi rim pa gang yin skabs 'dir byed pa yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)002:2118: gal te sngo thab shor na /
NK040(thi)002:2119: ri pa kun gyi rang rang lab sgron sku mdog dmar mor bsgom la /
NK040(thi)002:2120: kun gyi thabs 'dul zer zhing phata grangs med brjod pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)002:2121: rang gi thugs ka nas gser gyi rdo rje dang gnam lcags gis rdo rje gnyis 'phros byas pas /
NK040(thi)002:2123: kho rang la rgyab sdig byas pas gar yang 'gro dbang med par bsgoms /
NK040(thi)002:2124: de ma byas na shu thor la sogs pa 'ong ba yin pas /
NK040(thi)002:2125: hub ni phyur tsa ri pa kun gyis thugs dam mdzad pa gal che /
NK040(thi)002:2126: de'i rjes su phata gcig gis mi dmigs pa'i ngang la bzhag go //
NK040(thi)002:2127: yang na thab 'dul 'di ltar bya ste /
NK040(thi)002:2128: rang gis sha khrag nyil gyis song ba de /
NK040(thi)002:2129: snang srid la sogs thabs bdag thams cad kyis zos /
NK040(thi)002:2131: thab bdag de'i nad dang thabs kyi rlangs pa ma
NK040(thi)002:2132: lus pa thams cad bdag la thim par bsam zhing
NK040(thi)002:2134: ces tshad med dpal 'byor las gsungs so //
NK040(thi)002:2135: des gnas kyi byed las rdzogs nas /
NK040(thi)002:2136: de rnams kyis sbyor ba sngon 'gro'i chos song nas ////
